entry.title: Vaginism And Us by Narine_do_douce
entry.summary: A touching autobiographical piece surrounding Vaginismus. Narine_do_douce shares her experiences, good and bad, all to do with this frustrating condition. If you see yourself in todays comic, do yourself a favor and read up on some of our other Vaginismus comics! – Vaginismus by Erika Moen – Vestibulodynia by Alex Assan – And his follow […]

div.p: A touching autobiographical piece surrounding Vaginismus. Narine_do_douce shares her experiences, good and bad, all to do with this frustrating condition.
If you see yourself in todays comic, do yourself a favor and read up on some of our other Vaginismus comics!

– Vaginismus by Erika Moen
– Vestibulodynia by Alex Assan
– And his follow up… Vestibulectomy by Alex Assan
Now go visit Narine_do_douce IG and let her know she’s rad =D

Come and support us on Patreon! 2025 has been tough on us, and we need your financial help more than ever! If you enjoy these comics and want to see us continue to make them, come and drop us some support!

What to help us in a different way? Check out our socials, or post one of our shareable comics someplace it might get clicks:
Bluesky
Mastodon
Pillowfort
BETTER YET: just give us a follow, for free on Patreon

Finally the three cursed socials we’re trying to move away from
(but we still post to, sorta, kinda, maybe not for much longer…):
Twitter
Instagram
Facebook

div.div:
Vaginism and Us by narine_do_douce, published on April 15, 2024 on OhJoySexToy.com
narine_do_douce draws with a thin, organic line and a few wispy detail lines, giving it that subtly distinct European comic style. The color palette is mostly subtle, earthy yellows, browns, oranges, purples, and sage. Narine_do_douce is self described as a tall french-viet girl with long dark brown hair who always has eyeliner on.
Page 1
In the foreground of a bedroom, we see flower petals romantically strewn across the top of a wardrobe, which is also decorated with heart-decorated fancy candles, a box of tissue, two silver internal condom packages, and one used internal condom laid out flat next to them. The room is small and decorated like it belongs to a young woman, either a dorm room or a single, cramped apartment with posters on thee wall, a cork board with photos and notes, a big cartoonish stuffed animal, and a mini coatrack next to the bed with an assortment of hanging clothes.
A disgruntled couple sits on a bed in the background, clearly post-coital. narine_do_douce is fully nude except for her bedspread that is pulled up over her knees. She sits hunched over, hugging her knees and though she's facing towards her companion, her eyes look over her shoulder. Her companion looks at her with a mixture of being somewhat sheepish and confused as he sits on the edge of her bed, wearing only his shorts.
Narration: This weird thing happens every time I try to have sex. Nothing can enter or it hurts like hell...
From overhead and at a distance, we look down on the companion leaning over to hug narine_do_douce. They feel like a shipwrecked couple sitting on a raft in the middle of the ocean.
Narration: I really want to do it but... I can't.
narine_do_douce and a friend share a table at a bar, their sophisticated cocktails and an ashtray filling up the foreground.
"Some guy told me I was too tight." Muses narine_do_douce. Her long black hair flows past her shoulders and she wrests her chin gently against her hand.
The camera pulls back further to full show the pair at their table. narine_do_douce is a French-viet woman who wears a green halter top while her friend wears an orange t-shirt and jeans while smoking. The friend's shoulder-length brown hair is pushed loosely behind her ears, with a wisp falling along her cheek.
"Maybe that's because he sucks in bed?" The friend offers sympathetically with a half-smile, her cigarette smoke curling up and over her shoulder.
narine_do_douce smiles but then becomes downcast as she replies, "But, it's not just him. It's with every guy."
The friend looks at her with concern.
In a flashback, we join narine_do_douce in a different bedroom. A string of decorative mini-ball lantern lights glows in the low light, strung loosely across the wall. narine_do_douce sits on the bed with her knees drawn up on either side of her with a small round mirror braced between her feet and angled so she can see her vulva, which is obscured from us by her exploring hands. She only wears a bra and looks upset at the mirror as her hands probe around.
Present-day narine_do_douce's reply to her friend in the bar reads, "It's been 2 years since I'd done anything remotely sexual. I think I'm just not suited for sex. I can't even get a finger in!"
The flashback narine_do_douce with the mirror on the bed grumbles, "Argh, fuck!"
Returned to the present day in the bar, her friend gently points a finger at her, suggesting, "Or maybe you have vaginismus. You should look it up!"
Page 2
Back in the bedroom with the light string, narine_do_douce sits fully clothed on her floor with a cup of tea by her side against a cluster of seating pillows. She is looking in surprise at the laptop balanced on her crossed legs.
"Vaginismus." Her laptop informs her. "Vaginismus is when the vagina suddenly tightens up when you try to insert something into it. It can be painful and upsetting, but it can be treated."
Electrified, an extra-cartoonishly simplified icon of narine_do_douce explodes as she's struck by lightening as she realizes, "SEX CAN FEEL ?!"
Flashing back to a memory, she glares at a former companion who smiles oafishly at her while making the OK sign with one hand and with the other inserting his pointer finger into the hole.
Narration: Suddenly, I felt very angry at all of my past partners, who only focused on penetrative sex.
Standing triumphantly with her hands on her hips and a soft breeze blowing her long hair, the narration explains, "I got diagnosed pretty fast."
"It's you and me against the world baby!" She announces, wearing jeans and a t-shirt.
"Yell yeah." Her crotch announces through her jeans.
The view shifts to her fridge door with cute magnets holding up phots and various handwritten notes, like her grocery list and another one titled, "TODAY" which lists,
"-Call mom
-laundry
-Annoy everyone by talking about vaginsmus 24/7"
Out in a grassy field with speckles of colorful flowers, narine_do_douce lays on her back with her limbs starfished out.
Narration: Speaking about it was my way of coming to terms with years of sexual anguish. Despite having supportive friends, I needed something else.
Close by her head, we see the peachy-yellow sky from her vantage point with soft clouds lazily rolling by.
Narration: I needed community.
Page 3
Narration: I found a Facebook group of vaginsmus patients of my age.
The landing page of that group is displayed with a header graphic reading, "NO TABOOS" across three different nude torsos of various skin tones and shapes.
Narration: A whole new world opened.
On the Facebook page, a conversation unfolds.
narine_do_douce's text box: I kinda don't want dilators...
Tanya's text box: Totes! What are you planning then? :)
narine_do_douce adds a heart icon to Tanya's text and replies with a selfie of her giving a daring, mischievous look straight into the camera as she holds up both bands in front of her face, displaying the pointer and ring fingers dramatically, like hand-pistols pointing straight up and framing her face.
Narration: We were here for each other in our shared journey.
Back on the field, real life narine_do_douce still reclines on her back but is now joined by blue representations of her online friends, who also lay on their backs with her. They create a circle with their heads closer together and their bodies radiating outwards.
Their blue chat text boxes hover around them as they converse, several with reaction icons added to them.
Tanya: This one looks like my dildo! [heart reaction added by a friend]
Leo: Oh Tanya! [Devil emoji added by a friend]
Sam: Reminds me of my ex lmaooo
Lucy: [Three cry-laughing emojis in a row]
Chris: [Cry-laughing emoji and two laughing emojis]
Cruising along in a pink convertible with the top down, narine_do_douce joyfully explains, "Talking, laughing, crying, joking about vaginismus with the group felt so empower." Her blue digital friends throw their hands in the air as the wind wips their hair and clothes around them. "But in real life..."
Still in the driver's seat, but now somber and alone, narine_do_douce continues, "I was still struggling alone."
Page 4
Narration: And then, a friend confided in me.
Over text, a friend asks,
Iris: Hey, you have vaginismus right? Can we talk? Really struggling rn...
narine_do_douce: I'm on my way <3!
Pulling up to her friend in her pink convertible, narine_do_douce announces, "Hop in, bestie!"
The pair joyously roar off down the coastline freeway, past a helpful signpost with one arrow-shaped sign pointing to the left and reading, "Public restrooms", while the other sparkles with stars, pointing to the right and reading, "Road to pleasure!"
Narration: And this lonely path became a friends' road trip!
A collection of travel photos and postcards cascades across the panel.
Narration: Healing with Iris was the best. We were there in real life for every milestone.
Adjusting her sunhat at a jaunty angle, the friend poses for a close-up with the text, "It's Sunny in Wet-[obscured]" stamped in the corner in a funky font.
narine_do_douce and her friend sit serenely and leaning against each other on a big rock in a field of grass with a cave entrance behind them. In cursive, it is captioned, "Acceptance Cavern"
The friend poses with her fingers in peace signs in front of a beachside location sign reading, "ORGASM CAP"
Arm in arm, the friends pose triumphantly in front of a waterfall with a location sign declaring, "LUBE CASCADE"
"Hi from Confidence Bay!" Reads the final postcard, which shows the pair with their arms thrown around the others' shoulders and making big goof smiles in front of a sun setting at a beach.
Narration: From learning about lube to our first sex-positive relationships.
Page 5
Narration: A year later, we were in a much better spot.
With her luggage planted outside of the pink convertible, her friend stands on the pavement, leaning over the top as she happily tells narine_do_douce, "Thanks for the trip."
"Love you!" narine_do_douce replies from her spot behind the driver's wheel.
From overhead in a new bedroom, we see narine_do_douce entangled joyously with a partner on a rumpled bed.
Narration: Also, I had sex again. It was a blast.
At a sex shop's window, a variety of toys and underwear are on display.
Narration: It's now 6 years later.
Someone's voice asks, "Which one guys?"
Narration: I'm much more confident and open about my sexual hardships.
Narration: Vaginismus was the root of a lot of struggles.
narine_do_douce stands on the sidewalk with her friend as they scope out the toys on display. The blue online friends stand with them.
The friend declares, "The pink one!"
"You sure ?" Asks narine_do_douce. "Leo says the batter is awful."
Sam's text box in blue offers, "I have the wand, it's... something!" [A heart reaction is added]
Leo's blue text book adds, "The rabbit one! Amaziiing." [A hear reaction is added]
Narration: But, through healing and learning about... I grew more than I could have ever hoped for.
Transcribed April 14, 2025 by Erika Moen for OhJoySexToy.com

Enjoy today’s comic? Please consider supporting us and what we do! This little independent sex positive platform needs regular financial support from readers like you in order to stay afloat. More than ever in todays day and age!

div.div:
Critical Hit by Shyle Zalewski, published April 8, 2025 on OhJoySexToy.com
Page 1
Shyle Zalewski draws in a very rounded cartoony style with strong, textured ink lines. Sections of the environments are shaded with a halftone dot screen and the overall color palette is soft yellows, browns, and oranges, but that switches to a vibrant pink for the fantasy elements.
In a bustling house party, Shyle stands against a wall alone, holding a drink. The scene is set in yellow tones. She is an arty queer person with messy hair and giant glasses.
" What a disappointing party." Shyle grouses to herself. "This is the last time I go to one of these boring and pretentious exhibitions. Look at all these NPCs right here. Pretty all the same."
In her imagination, bright pink character profile cards pop up, listing the statistics of:
Henri Clavel, a smug blond medieval-esque warrior
Class: Paladin
Hobby: Killing Dragons
Likes: Money
Louis Grand, who wears the exact same outfit but has shorter hair and a more awkward smile.
Class: Paladin
Hobby: Killing orcs
Likes: Gold
Jacques Dubus, yet another fellow in the same outfit but he has a mustache and a big smile.
Class: Paladin
Hobby: Killing Goblins
Likes: Banks
Back into the yellow-hued reality at the part, Shyle does a double-take as she takes a drink, spotting something across the room. "Uh...? I may have spoken too soon. I think I see a different kind of character here."
From her perspective, we see Matt, a cute nerd with tinted hair.
"Well," She thinks to herself. "he's cute and seems funny... Plus he's wearing a Dungeons & Dragons shirt."
A pink stat box appears next to him, reading:
"Matt Coton
Class: Archer
Hobby: Ukulele
Likes: Gaming"
Another pink "Start the Game" button appears next to him, festooned with a little witch's hat and a bow and arrow. A giant white arrow cursor clicks it.
Page 2
Matt, still in the yellow party, smiles at the reader, unaware of the imaginary pink options window that's appeared across the bottom of the panel. It gives the options:
"Start a conversation.
A: Wassup duuude?!!
B: (Awkward Silence)
C: My butt is all yours.
D: So, you're into D&D" --Which is the one that the arrow cursor clicks.
Shyle and Matt launch into an animated conversation depicted through pink pictograms in word balloons. The pink image-word balloons include a treasure map, an angry orc face, a castle, crossed swords, a fire ball, a shield, and a star. They shine against the yellow backdrop of the party.
"Dang!" Shyle thinks, looking flustered. "His stats are SO high! I feel like a newbie."
Matt smiles sweetly, oblivious to Shyle's assessment. In pink, his stats pop up in an information box next to him (who is still in yellow tones):
Charisma: lvl 45
Intell: lvl 50
Hotness lvl 90
"Ok, let's try this." She thinks to herself with an eager/nervous smile. Then gesturing to a door, she says aloud, "This place sucks. Wanna go out for a drink?" as she discreetly rolls two imaginary pink dice.
All in bright pink, an explosive caption box announces, "SUCCESS!! Your awkwardness makes you funny and kinda safe." Two giant pink 20-sided dice roll up with an 18 and a 20.
In pink, an caption box that looks weathered like an old piece of parchment reads, "MATT is joining the team!" with little pink stars sparkling around Matt, who is still in yellow and brown tones. "Ok!" He cheerily agrees.
"Everything is expensive around here, would you prefer to go to my home? I live 200 feet away." He offers to Shyle, who blushes and smiles flirtatiously in response.
In pink, another explosive caption box announces, "NEW QUEST UPDATE!!"
Page 3
Now outside a new yellow-toned door with an arrow-adorned shield mounted on it, a pink old-timey scroll explains, "Next Level: The Archer's House."
Inside Matt's apartment, the two lose no time as they begin making out, still standing in the middle of the entryway. A pink caption announces, "SPEED ATTACK!!"
Confidently, Shyle announces, "...My turn to play, now." to Matt, who smiles lustily back at her.
A tattered pink parchment narrates, "The Witch Takes Off: Clothes" followed by a stat window with the information,
"-10 Armor
-5 Warmth
+56 Sluttiness"
A pink thermometer "Desire Gauge" appears next to yellow-toned Matt, who sits on the bed in the background looking a little flustered as he watches Shyle pull off her underwear while standing in the foreground. With her butt to us, she balances on one leg as she deftly maneuvers the underwear over her lifted ankle.
Grinning a blushing, Matt ventures, "You know, I'm not used to inviting people to my place so fast. But... you were..."
"...Bewitching?" Shyle finishes for him, returning a mischievously horny grin.
"Can I teleport myself down here?" Asks Shyle as she drops out of sight from the panel, the top of her head indicating that she is right at dick-level with Matt- who, in turn, looks surprised and flustered as he blushes.
A pink scroll declares, "Effect on Archer: STUNNED!"
"OoooOOOOOOH..." Matt moans as Shyle goes to town with her mouth on his cock, which is annotated with helpful "Suck! Suck! Suck!" sound effects.
"...Mmmmh." She purrs to herself as she sucks away. "As a witch, it's what I call a freakin' MAGIC WAND!"
Page 4
Flipping her around so she leans over the bed, Matt smacks her ass while declaring, "Slow down, you slutty witch, that's way too good, haha!"
In pink, the caption explodes with the text, "Archer Special Skill, 'buttdiving'", which is displayed helpfully over Matt burying his face between Shyle's cheeks.
The pink scroll explains, "It's super effective!" over Shyle's sex-drunk face.
"OoOOooh! Do that forever plz..." She drools to the sounds of Matt licking away on her ass.
"The witch cast an ancient spell:" A pink scroll narrates over Shyle blushing as she removes her glasses, looking back over her shoulder at Matt.
"Now... Encule-moi!" She declares in cursive.
A pink scroll unfurls, recounting the message, "In an old mysterious language called "French", it means: FUCK MY ASS. -en is for "putting in", -cule, for "cul", is "butt/ass", -moi is for "me"
A large pink arrow flies overhead with the caption, "Entering the dungeon: 67%" above our couple who are totally doin' it doggy-style. Shyle's face is flushed pink against the rest of the yellow-tones of the panel.
A "HAA!" rings out in pink explosive letters over an illustration of a butt-like peach with the feathered end of an arrow sticking out between its mounds. "It's in!" The peach shouts triumphantly.
As Matt plows Shyle the panel fills with the sound of yellow "CLAP! CLAP! CLAP!" sound effects and pink "+99EXP" points.
The two collapse into bed, sweaty, exhausted, and satisfied. They pant and blush as their blood pressure settles.
"The witch evolves into: Happy Witch" announces a pink parchment over Matt as Shyle nestles her contented face against his shoulder.
Transcribed by Erika Moen on april 7, 2025 for https://www.ohjoysextoy.com/critical-hit-shyle-zalewski

div.div:
Ripley gets brave, and attends Size Con with the team! A piece of autobio, journalism and kink, all mixed into one, and a fun way to see some of the process behind OJST’s first group outing.
A shout out to Editor Ziggy helped make this one happen this week. He helped write the early pages and we’re all really proud of how it shaped out.
And another word of thanks to the wonderful team at Size Con for inviting us and being such great hosts!
Ripleys Links!
BlueSky
Here on OJST!
Now that you’ve made it here to the bottom, I want to encourage you to come and sign up to the Patreon! It’s 2025 and OJST needs your financial support if you want to see these comics continue appearing! Please consider helping the site each month for what we do!
And if not – a social follow and re-tweet/x/skeet/reddit-post would do us wonders!
Bluesky
Mastodon
Pillowfort
BETTER YET: just give us a follow (for free) on Patreon
Finally the three socials we’re trying to get farrrr away from:
Twitter
Instagram
Facebook
(I’m also still on the hunt for a sub-reddit poster/moderator for OJST, Ping me!)
<!-- function toggle_expander(id) { var e = document.getElementById(id); if(e.style.height == 'auto') e.style.height = '1px'; else e.style.height = 'auto'; } //-->
↓ Comic Transcript
Ripley LaCross draws in a simplified-realistic cartoon-ish style, using a color palette of white and purples with soft dark grey pencil lines.
Page 1
From behind, we see Ripley working at their digital art setup with two illuminated screens propped up on their desk in front of them. In one hand Ripley holds a stylus with an extra chunky finger cushion and in the other they're checking their phone, which loudly pings at them. We can faintly hear music playing from Ripley's over-ear thick black headphones.
Ripley's hair is bushy with the sides shaved down to stubble, making a relaxed mohawk or dapper mullet. They wear a black blazer over their collared blue shirt, with black pants and boots, with skinny glasses topping them off. They sport various facial and ear piercings along with a hint of mustache and beard against their white skin tone.
Matt Nolan's profile picture appears next to his text message that appears on Ripley's phone. He is the Big Boss of Oh Joy Sex Toy and one of the two comics editors. "Hey, team!" Matt's text announces. "The organizers at SizeCon reached out to ask if we're interested in going! It's being held in Portland this year. Any interest? https://sizecon.com/
Ziggy is the other comic editor and his profile picture, including his dog Elivra, appears next to his text response, "[Three eyeballs emojis in a row] That's a giant YES fro me!"
Biting their finger nervously, Ripley muses to themself, "...I can't even go into a toy shop without wanting to implode..." and then types into the group chat, "Oooh! [eyeballs emoji] ...Maybe?? Not really my flavor of kink... I've never been to a show like that, either."
"It'll be so fun!!" Ziggy quickly texts. "Art! Vendors! Workshops! Demonstrations! Community-building socials!"
Aloud, Ripley ponders, "Oh my god, demos, too??"
For a tense moment, we zoom in on Ripley's face as it seriously considers their phone as if it were a bomb needing to be diffused.
Pulled back again, we see just Ripley's finger decisively press down on their phone, sending the text message, "I'm in!"
"YESSS! OJST FIELD TRIP!!!" Ziggy immediately texts back.
Pulled back further still, Ripley gingerly holds their phone in one hand as they cradle their head in the other, asking aloud, "...I hope I don't regret this..."
Page 2
A calendar page for February flutters on the wall, showing that SizeCon was three weeks away but the hatch mark across each day's box shows us that time has passed and that date is now today.
"Ziggggyyy!!" Ripley's private chat text reads. "My tummy hurts just thinking about the show today >_<"
"Liiiiiiiike you swallowed a bunch of tiny people, oor..." Ziggy's text teases back.
"Ping!" announces the group chat as Matt's message comes through, "On my way! to pick you up, Ripley!"
Back in the private chat to Ziggy, Ripley resumes, "... Ziggy no. I'm just so bad in crowds?? And strangers and sexy stuff and... kink... I'M JUST AN AWKWARD LITTLE GUY." A chibi version of himself appears next to his text, sweating and fretting with cartoonishly oversized sweat drops.
Chibi Ziggy appears next to his own chat reply. He has a short scruffy shock of hair on the top of his head with the sides shaved, and sports big round glasses, guaged ears, and a sparse mustache. Devilishly, he holds up a small animal safety vest labeled, "NERVOUS" as he replies, "What if we got you a NERVOUS DOG harness?"
"LMAO if only" Chibi Ripley answers, before leaning in closer to examine the vest, musing to themself, "...hmmm maybe?"
"Well today is the slowest day of the show, so it shouldn't even be all that crowded!" Chibi Ziggy continues. "And tbh everyone always wats to talk to Erika anyway, so you may be able to get away with just lurking!"
A relieved Chibi Ripley answers, "Our social savior [prayer emoji hands] You're probably right! It'll be fine."
"Ping!" goes the group chat as Matt texts, "BTW! Erika's not feeling great so she's sitting this one out."
"Balls." Thinks Chibi Ripley, looking at their phone blankly.
Ripley's normally-drawn face timidly peeks into an empty panel, show sweat rolling down their forehead as they say to themself, "...what if I say I'm sick...?"
Then, breaking free of panel borders, we see the top half of Ripley radiating manufactured confidence as they announce, "NO. You made a commitment! You're gonna be cool, and chill, and confident, and FINE!"
"...Right?" Ripley thinks to themself outside of the convention center, seeing the other patrons walking into the unassuming building.
Page 3
Inside the building, all of the OJST crew wears N95 masks, though very few of the other attendees or exhibitors do. Ziggy is in the process of putting on their attendee badge from the check-in table while Ripley is being handed their own. Attendees mill around, entering through a part in some thick black curtains that form a temporary wall. Tentatively, Ripley pulls back a curtain panel, peeking their face through to see what lays on the other side.
Framed between the parted black curtains, Ripley recoils in horror at the claustrophobic cluster of preview bubbles containing snapshots of scenes from around the con. There are LOTS of people.
Ripley's thoughts flock around their head, panic-thinking, "Oh. Oh no, it's so cramped. Why does it feel louder than it actually is? I feel like prey. Keep moving. Don't stand still. Oh wow, people really like my vest. Crap, am I leering? What am I doing??"
"Last call for the Ace Social!" a voice cuts through the pandemonium.
Panic-sweating, Ripley takes this opportunity to zip out the open door to the announced meeting.
Page 4
From behind Ripley, we see a large circle of people sitting in folding chairs. The others are cast in light while Ripley is starkly in shadow, with the helpful caption, "Realizing they don't know what a 'Social' even is."
Our view pivots overhead as Ripley sits down in an open chair, showing us a diverse assortment of people sitting in the circle.
Caption: Social: A casual gathering for the purpose of conversation.
"Out of the pan and into the fire, I guess." Ripley thinks to themself with some nervous forehead sweating.
Snippets of people's introductions float by various attendees who are drawn to keep their identities obscurred.
"Hi, I'm [---] and I've known I'm asexual since my teen years...]" Says one person, while another explains, "It all started when my grandma showed me Honey, I Shrunk The Kids..." A timid person volunteers, "Being gay has meant I'm expected to be hypersexual, but... I'm not."
Finally Ripley introduces themself, saying, "H-hi, I'm Ripley. they/he. And... I realized I'm Asexual just a few years ago... turns out that I wasn't actually sexually attracted to my crushes: I just had gender envy..."
Page 5
At the end of the Social as people are leaving the circle, another attendee approaches Ripley, asking, "What did you mean by 'gender envy?'"
"Oh!" Replies Ripley, looking much more comfortable than before. "It's like... a deep attraction to how they presented their gender, and I'd wished I could do the same..."
Narration: It takes me a long time to get comfortable with anyone. Multiply the number of people (and sprinkle in some deeply personal topics) and I'll freeze to the point of pain.
Rejoining Matt and Ziggy on the crowded floor, Ripley says a little sheepishly, "Hey guys, what's up? Sorry I disappeared!"
"No worries!" Ziggy replies with a laugh. "Wanna meet another OJST artist?"
"Sure!" Ripley enthuses.
At DarkChibi Shadow's merchandise table, Ziggy gives a double thumbs up to the artist while Ripley gives a friendly but nervous wave hello. DarkChibi Shadow has short dark hair, glasses, and wears a dark N95 mask covering most of their face. The vibes are good amongst them all.
Narration: But as it turns out, social ice breakers actually work! (I know, shocker!!) Most people are shy and awkward in public. So why not just be awkward together?
The view pulls back showing the OJST team chatting away with DarkChibi Shadow at their table, comfortably embedded in the busy convention hall with other exhibitors at their tables and attendees milling around.
Narration: A moment of discomfort is worth a lifetime of rewards.
Matt's chat text appears with a "PING!", saying "Hey gang! PDX KinkFest is next month... [smirking emoji face]"
"Hell yeah, count me in!" replies Ripley's text.
Transcribed March 30, 2025 by Erika Moen for ohjoysextoy.com
<!-- document.getElementById('transcript-content').style.height = '1px'; //-->

entry.title: Reshaping Sex Culture One Comic at a Time
entry.summary: Holy cow, Matvei Mozhaev‘s two-part radio documentary for Queery on Oh Joy Sex Toy is just… Wow. Part One: Reshaping Sex Culture One Comic at a Time This is a perfect introduction for a new reader to find out just what the heck this thing is and it’s a fascinating peek behind the curtain for […]

div.p: Holy cow, Matvei Mozhaev‘s two-part radio documentary for Queery on Oh Joy Sex Toy is just… Wow .

h2.strong: Part One: Reshaping Sex Culture One Comic at a Time

div.p: This is a perfect introduction for a new reader to find out just what the heck this thing is and it’s a fascinating peek behind the curtain for how this all comes together for folks who already follow the comics each week. This is such a loving, revealing tour around the world of Oh Joy Sex Toy and the many different people who produce it and read it.

h2.strong: Part Two: Drawing Resilience from Sex Positivity

div.p: This follow-up really gets into the meat of our tiny comics production house and the challenges we face, both for our creative contributors and for us as a company from the public. Staff artist Hien Pham shares how he navigates our editorial needs while trying to remain true to the stories he actually wants to tell. As a sex-positive publishing house, it continues to be harder and harder to exist on the Mainstream Internet as riffraff like us are forced off social media and face a volatile political landscape. Plus: Creators Matt and Erika are just plum getting old!

It is the passion and support of OJST’s creators and audience that keeps it afloat. Please give a listen to our actual readers, contributors, and creators in their own words in this candid look behind the scenes at what it means to keep Oh Joy Sex Toy alive and thriving.

Thank you so much to all of our readers and contributors who called in to share their thoughts and feelings about this decade+ long sex-positive comic project, and thank you to Matvei Mozhaev for pouring in the research and hours to make this episode for Queery on the radio station WORT 89.9 fm.

div.data-a2a-title: Reshaping Sex Culture One Comic at a Time

div.div:
Come join me as I explore the Western Australia’s Pups and Handlers‘ first kinky social event of 2025 where friendships were made and a queer community was built. Massive thank-you to WA-PAH for putting on a lovely party! I’ve always felt their welcoming embrace, and I hope this love letter can express my gratitude. Funnily enough, it was an OJST comic from 8 years ago that first piqued my interest in the Pups, and now I’m contributing to the Pups comics catalogue!
Dear reader, if there’s a Pups & Handlers club near you, I’d highly recommend reaching out and attending your local events. First-timers might find socializing difficult, but I’d wager you can say hi to one of the organizers and they’d likely be very happy to introduce you to the scene!
Portfolio
Interactive stuff
Patreon
Bluesky
Sexy Comics
Here on OJST!
Matt’s Note! Looking for Volume 1? Me too, till I realized that Volume 2 is the name of the event, whoops :D !
Please consider signing up to the Patreon or one of our Socials bellow! Awesome comics like these, take huge amounts of time and are only possible with your financial support!
Bluesky
Mastodon
Pillowfort
BETTER YET: just give us a follow, (You can for free on Patreon, too!)
Finally the three cursed socials we’re trying to move away from:
(but we still post to, sorta, kinda, maybe not for much longer…)
Twitter
Instagram
Facebook
<!-- function toggle_expander(id) { var e = document.getElementById(id); if(e.style.height == 'auto') e.style.height = '1px'; else e.style.height = 'auto'; } //-->
↓ Comic Transcript
Kennel Club Vol. 2 by Hien Pham, published March 25, 2025 for ohjoysextoy.com
Page 1
Hien Pham illustrates his comic with a simplified realistic style with lovingly rendered hair details that sweep along his characters like waves on the ocean. While the coloring on the figures is more flat, the textures and reflections on their leather, neoprene, and spandex outfits are rendered much more realistically. He uses a full spectrum of colors.
A close-up panel shows two hands rubbing a clear liquid across the chest of a person wearing a tight black tanktop-like fetish top with a zipper going down the middle. The thick latex material reflects the light.
"So... what does this do?" Asks the voice attached to the massaging hands. "Lubing up your suit?"
The next panel pulls back to reveal Hien Pham squirting another splash of lube onto Clay's latex vest. A thick blue strip runs down the side of the top under his armpit, which is exposed because he holds both his hands behind his masked head. The blue dog ears and muzzle of the mask match the stripe on the vest, in addition to yellow accents.
"Oh!" Exclaims Clay, looking downwards at Hien as he works in the lube to his chest. "Silicone lube gives latex its shine!"
Clay's latex-clad belly sparkles in the light as Hien runs a lube-y hand over it. Hien is a Southeast Asian cisgender heavyset man with a short, bushy, black beard, fuzzy body hair, and glasses. He is mostly bald on top, with the rest of his hair pulled back into a proud bun. He wears a cross-back leather harness that connects to his shorts like suspenders.
"It also keeps the suit from drying out and cracking!" Continues Clay as Hien rubs in lube between his thighs. "Plus, it's quite fun and intimate too! Don't you think?"
"Yeah, I definite do think!" Hien replies cheekily with a blush from between Clay's legs.
Another person enters the room carrying their own bottle of lube, asking, "Clay, can you get my back?" The new person wears a sleeveless black top and a thick industrial chain with a padlock around their neck. They have a short, trimmed beard and mustache, with an undercut hairstyle that's shorter on the sides than the top.
"I can do it!" Hien volunteers, holding up his hand which drips lube. "My hands are already slick!"
Narration: Last month, I went to the Western Australia Pups and Handlers' first social even of 2025: Kennel Club Vol. 2!
Page two
Narration: The event was held on a Sunday afternoon on the top floor of Connections Nightclub, the longest-running gay club in the southern hemisphere!
The page is filled with an angled top-down view of a brick building with a transparent roof, revealing the rooms and inhabitants within. The artwork transitions from the realistic style to a simplified, cartoon-y one, depicting all the people as short chibi versions of themselves. Many people wear fetish pup masks, which are a very stylized, almost cartoonish kind of hood made of a thick material like leather, neoprene, or spandex-- they are not realistic to real dogs at all and there is no fur on them.
Throughout the building, the various areas are labeled:
-Entrance!
-Terrace and smoking area!
-Performance and announcement stage! (part of the outdoor terrace, with disco balls)
-Little hide-away cuddle cove with cushy seats!
-Charcuterie boards with lollies and snacks!
-Open bar!
-Padded mosh area with dog toys!
-Informal changing room and bag drop.
-toilets.
One chibi person without a hood on checks their phone while sitting on the terrace while two hooded people dance. Inside the cuddle cove, a couple dances- one wearing a mask and the other bare-faced but wearing their 2023 Mr. Bear titleholder sash with orange, yellow, white, and black color squares. A hooded person on their knees gleefully chomps on a tennis ball in the padded mosh area, while other folks mill about the rest of the building areas. In the kitchen area, the International Puppy & Trainer Contest titleholder parties in a blue leather sash and a black, yellow, and orange pup hood.
Page three
The art reverts back to Hien's more realistic style on this page.
Narration: There was no show, no exhibition. This was simply a space where like-minded folks could wear gear, and enjoy each other's queer company.
"Aroo! Good to see you!" Greats a person in an orange pup hood, wearing their regular human glasses over the mask. They have a matching thick orange collar around their neck and an open blue button-down shirt revealing their bare chest and belly beneath. Affectionately, they nudge Hien's shoulder with their muzzle.
"Good to se you too!" Replies Hien who is cooling himself with a pleated purple hand fan. "How are you going?"
Narration: The crowd welcomed pups and handlers, as well as allies and all those curious.
A glimpse of the party-goers are shown talking with each other. One person has bushy hair, a hoop pierced ear, a green thick collar, and a black fetish vest. They talk with a person in a giant mascot tiger head and paws and another person with long brown hair, latex top, and pink furry kitty ears.
Narration: There was a variety of kinky equipment on display: leather, rubber, latex, the lot! Many were in everyday clothes, too!
A variety of fetish accoutrements are worn by partygoers, including colorful strap-on silicone tails (that look like they may double as penetration toys, perhaps?) and a blue leather flogger that's clipped to a belt.
Narration: The atmosphere was whimsical and affectionate. It wasn't hard to find yourself in casual conversations about any given niche that makes someone tick.
Two people bump their muzzles together, nose-to-nose. On wears a full brown, yellow, and black pup mask leaving only their bushy brown top hair and beard tumbling out from the top and bottom. The other person wears just a muzzle over their nose and mouth that is made of dark and light blue, with a light blue collar around their neck to match.
In the background, a person in a black, purple, and yellow full pup hood chats with Hien.
"...so I tied a simple cuff, then got them on their knees, and pulled their hands toward their feet!" The person explains to Hien, bumping their purple-cuffed wrists together to illustrate their point.
"That's free real estate for wedgies right there!" Hien replies, confidently bapping his shoulder with his closed fan.
Now fluttering his fan in front of his face, the narration reads, "The demographic skewed younger than the Bears I was used to, and sometimes, when the music got too loud, my social anxiety got in my head, and I felt so incredibly out of place."
Page Four
Narration: A skill I've learned over the years is how to find a good quiet corner to recharge in.
Hien sits down into an empty couch, fanning himself. Partially drained glasses and snacks sit in the foreground.
Narration: Somewhere I can close my eyes, hold my hands, and sit with my feelings for a little while.
Hien takes a calming breath with his eyes closed.
Narration: Oftentimes, friends and folks looking for the same peace and quiet would come over to join me.
From Hien's point of view, we see his hands in his lap, with his closed fan resting on the top of his left leg. One hand tightly squeezes his other hand's thumb until a voice interrupts-
"Hien!"
The camera pulls back again to reveal a short-haired blonde person with a busy mustache sitting down on the couch's backrest to look down at Hien.
"You okay?" The blonde person asks jovially.
"Yeah. I'm okay." Replies Hien, suddenly pulled back to reality.
Narration: I've been trying to shift from dwelling on my anxiety to acknowledging how people have made an active effort to be in my company. When it works, that little change in mindset helps center me back into the present.
Now with enthusiasm, Hien invites his friend to "Come sit and cuddle with me!"
"Okay!" The friend agrees, sliding down to sit with Hien.
Page Five
A full mask in dark and light brown pops up between Hien and his friend from behind the couch.
"What are you guys talking about?" The new pup asks, throwing their arms over the shoulders of Hien and his friend.
"Oh hello!" Chirps the blonde person in their open black leather vest and bare chest exposed beneath.
"The Substance!" Hien answers the new person's question. "Have you seen? It's so good!"
Narration: I'm so grateful for these events that remove pressure, expectations, and shame from queer existence.
A person in a fantastical dragon-type red and black hood offers up a platter of fancy drinks (or... some kind of ice cream scoops over ice?) to a person in a rainbow colored muzzle and a leather crown with stripes in Pups Pride flag colors of white, blue, and black.
"Shark-bari!" Shouts a muzzled person in another area of the party as Hien proudly displays his stuffed shark that is bound up in shibari ropes.
Narration: These spaces build communities when we need to stand together the most. In celebration, and persistence.
Narration: I might not fancy myself a pup or a handler, at least not yet...
Hien and some partygoers pose as a voice calls from off-panel, "Three, two, one-"
"AROOO!!" Howls the trio as they flex and strike a pose for the photographer.
Narration: But getting to witness my friends' joy feels no less than a privilege.
"You're off?" Asks a friend in a full pup hood as they hug Hien.
"Yeah, I'm so tired..." Hien groggily replies.
Narration: Kennel Club filled my heart to the brim, and I cannot wait for the next event in May!
In a conga line, chibi-fied versions of Hien and two more friends run to the edge of the page, arranged tallest to shortest (Hien).
"Let's get dumplings!" Declares the tallest friend.
"Yas!!" Hien concurs, leading the line.
Transcribed by Erika Moen on March 24, 2025 for ohjoysextoy.com

div.p: Inam journals up an adventure as she bravely visits the Atlantic Sex Show in Halifax!
A lovely fun slice of journalism taking us a little bit behind the curtain. Thank you so much Inam for the rad comic!

Do you crave more kink community? WELL DO I HAVE THE PLACE FOR YOU… Come and join us on OJST’s! ;D We’ll fill your inbox up with a comic each week, and you’ll be able to feel good knowing you’re part of the crowd supporting sex positive comics!

And after you’re done signing up… check out our socials!

div.data-a2a-title: A Night At The Atlantic Sex Show by Inam

div.script: <!-- function toggle_expander(id) { var e = document.getElementById(id); if(e.style.height == 'auto') e.style.height = '1px'; else e.style.height = 'auto'; } //-->

div.div:
A Night at the Atlantic Sex Show by Inam, published 3/18/2025 for ohjoysextoy.com
Inam draws in a loose, almost-sketchy simplified style. The color palette is blues, pinks, and oranges with black line work.
Inam is a bug-eyed girl wearing a bat-earned hood. She energetically points at her phone while making intense eye contact with the reader, saying, "When I was in Halifax in February, I went to opening night at the Atlantic Sex Show!" Zipper up her winter parker, she continues, "It's a sexy convention... in the middle of winter." while snow blows around her.
Narration: I've always illustrated stories about sex and kink, but it's only in the last year I've started to realise I can actually try doing some of the stuff I've drawn.
She trudges through the knee-high snow, her feet making crunching noises with each step. She walks in the direction of an "ASS" sandwich board sign.
"Why did I wear all these layers... She wonders as she pushes open the door to the convention building. Sweat drips down her face.
"Oh, they have a coat rack." She observes and then notices another person removing their heavy winter coat to reveal sexy black underwear beneath. "OH! I could have worn a sexy outfit!"
Caption: (Most people wore regular street clothes though)
Narration: I'm also nosy and wanted to see how other erotic artists make a living.
Inam wanders through the convention hall with her n95 mask secured over her nose and mouth. She walks by tables and booths with their wares on display. A giant bracelet with heart beads floats overhead next to two art prints, one of a fox and the other a fairy.
"Handmade jewelry... Nature and plants... Surprisingly normal?" Inam pulls aside their mask to sample some freeze dried candy from a jar, asking themself, "why"
Peeking into a dark room, Inam peers over the shoulder of a person drawing on a big paper pad, their subject a nude model reclining on a fainting couch. "Live life drawing!" She thinks to herself. "Impressive!"
Squinting at her phone, she thinks to herself, "OK I have GOT to find this dungeon or I'm going to miss these demos! There's going to be fire, ropes, and something called the VacCube?!!"
Page Two
She exits an elevator, thinking, "Found it."
Narration: In my head, I guess I pictured a kink demo like this: There'd probably be a stage and someone would narrate everything.
In her imagination, we see a brightly lit stage with a presenter wearing a tuxedo addressing the audience. The presenter gestures at the couple on the stage with a pointer in one hand and speaks confidently into the microphone in their other hand. To their side is a sandwich board holding up scientific-looking diagrams. On stage, a larger person kneels with their pants dropped, no top on, and a bondage mask covering their head. Another person pauses in the middle of flogging the kneeling person. They, too, wear a bondage mask (but with pig tails), fancy underwear, and thigh-high boots.
Narration: But actually, it's more like..."
The scene shifts to darker lighting.
Caption: Laughing!
A person dressed business casual flogs another person who is topless and attached at the wrists to a giant X structure. The bound person is blindfolded and laughing as the flogger SMACKs against their back.
Caption: Talking!
A handful of people chat against a wall in a room. One person is dressed business casual and waves to someone off panel. A person dressed in a t-shirt and jeans sits in a wheelchair, chatting with someone dressed in a cheerleader outfit.
Caption: Sentimental upbeat folk music?
Two giant speakers play music on a stage.
Caption: Clapping!
A large audience applauds and cheers from bleachers, including Inam.
Page Three
From the bleachers, Inam is transfixed by something happening on the stage as she thinks to herself, "Woah, they're using fire! I want to take a look... Can I?"
"hi" Inam greets the people in a demo area with a friendly wave.
"hi" each of the three people greets her in return. Their demo area is cordoned off with velvet ropes and giant curtains cascade down in the background. On person sits on the demonstration table wearing only star-shaped pasties, underwear, and knee-high baggy socks. Another person stands by the table wearing a short dress, glasses, and a badge on a lanyard. The third person wears a collared shirt and slacks, standing behind the table.
In a different area with its own velvet rope, a person wearing thigh-high boots and little else greets their friend with a "You made it!" The friend waves back, wearing jeans, a long-sleeved striped top, and carrying their purse in hand.
Narration: I was struck by how talkative and relaxed everyone was with each other.
Back to the demonstration table, the person who was sitting on it is now laying on their belly, leaving their back exposed as the demonstrator in the collared shirt ignites small pools of liquid on their back.
"How's that? Is that a good heat?" Asks the demonstrator as they deftly handle a lit wand over the volunteer's back, creating small flashes of fire light.
"Yes." Replies the person with bursts of fire lighting across their skin.
Narration: It felt like the kink community in Halifax must be really tight-knit.
Inam's view it filled with a different scene, this one showing a person suspended from the ceiling by intricately tied ropes around their chest, arms, thighs, and ankles. Their long hair flutters as their body sways in the air. They are nude aside from their underwear. Another person stands by, running their hand through the suspended person's hair and smiling affectionately at them. The standing person wears a bra and collar, with a star under each eye and their hair pulled into a high ponytail.
Narration: And I was really moved by seeing the amount of trust they put in each other.
The scene concludes with the formerly suspended person now resting delicately on the ground with their head resting in the lap of the other person. The resting person looks vulnerable but safe, while the sitting person strokes their hair and beams at the applauding audience.
"Th-they must care about each other soooo much!!!" Inam thinks to herself as her eyes overflow with tears. "This is so beautiful!!!"
Page Four
Narration: I was really surprised by all the cool and interesting toys they had on display.
A table displays a paddle with a thickly furry side, an oversized "novelty" hammer, and "a sword???"
"What would you use that for?!" Inam thinks to herself.
At another demonstration, a person kneels over some furniture in a tiny dress, exposing their streaked bottom. Another person stands at their side in a leather harness top exposing their chest and long tight black pants. The standing person holds a long sword in their hands, clearly in the middle of spanking the bent over person with the flat length of the blade.
Narration: I never thought I'd see people spanking each other with medieval weapons. I didn't know kink could be this fun and light-hearted. I loved it."
Quietly, Inam pushes open a back door.
Narration: When the dungeon got too crowded for me, I decided to head out to the vendors hall.
Poor Inam is blasted with garishly loud music as she enters a hall with rows of tables lined up and people inspecting their wares on them.
Narration: The stage was SO blaringly loud, and I got so nervous I ended up making several loops of the hall before I finally approached a seller.
From Inam's point of view, we see a cheerful vendor standing behind their table and holding out a sex toy.
Narration: And they were so, so friendly and helpful, I instantly felt better the moment we talked.
"We're a local Canadian toy company!" Chirps the vendor.
At another booth, a vendor stands as they show off a flogger that they dangle against their free hand. "Suede is a really soft material..." They explain.
Narration: It was so nice to hear them talk so passionately about their work.
From a different table, Inam reaches out to accept their bagged up purchase from a very tired (but still friendly) vendor.
Narration: I really felt for them having to work adjacent to a raging dance party thought.
"I WISH I WAS IN BED!" The vendor shouts over the music wearily as they wave goodbye to Inam.
Page Five
"I think it's time to call it a night..." Inam thinks to herself as she loads her purchases into her backpack.
With regret in her eyes and odd diagrams with question marks floating by her head, she thinks, "I'm sorry, VacCube... you will remain a mystery to me for now..."
Triumphantly, she marches back out into the nighttime cold, leaving little puffs of breath floating up into the sky.
Narration: I feel like I learned more in a single night at the Sex Show than I ever did from books and photos. All the silliness, tenderness and openness on display throughout the night gave me such a buzz (and also made me very hungry).
From the point of view of a street vendor, they hand down a take-out container of poutine to Inam, who stands on the sidewalk looking up expectantly at the warm meal.
Back at eye level, Inam looks at the reader, smiling just a bit mischievously as they take a big bite out of their meal and hold a big old dildo in the other hand. In the background, a handful of jacketed Sex Show patrons make their way home, their fishnets and boots revealing where they have just been.
Narration: I would 100% go again, and I'm already looking forward to next year.
Transcribed by Erika Moen on March 16, 2025 for ohjoysextoy.com

entry.title: Calling The Shots by Daverage

Fortunately, Daverage has written a sweetly sexy story that helps two long distance lovers CUM together ;D Ever so thankful for Daverage – I’ve been a fan of their work for ages, was super excited […]

div.p: When you’re long distance, sometimes you gotta phone it in with your sweetie— but that don’t mean it’s not good! Fortunately, Daverage has written a sweetly sexy story that helps two long distance lovers CUM together ;D
Ever so thankful for Daverage – I’ve been a fan of their work for ages, was super excited to finally get one of their comics!

Once your done signing up as one of Daverages Patreon’s, come and join us on OJST’s! I was invited to be a part of a conventions comics panel a few weeks ago, and so many folk had questions about Patreon, and the best ways to support artists. Truely – we couldn’t make this site without your support there, and it’s simple the best way to creators! And hey, if cash is tight, consider follow us on one of our socials! Follows and likes mean the world to us!

Bluesky
Mastodon
Pillowfort
BETTER YET: just give us a follow, for free on Patreon

Finally the three cursed socials we’re trying to move away from
(but we still post to, sorta, kinda, maybe not for much longer…):
Twitter
Instagram
Facebook
Erika and I are FINALLY over our winter-time-Covid, what a month! We’re getting back into the swing of things; and I’m looking for more artists and comics!
div.script: <!-- function toggle_expander(id) { var e = document.getElementById(id); if(e.style.height == 'auto') e.style.height = '1px'; else e.style.height = 'auto'; } //-->

div.div:
Daverage draws with a soft, cartoony style and candy colors.
Abby is an anthropomorphic rabbit with a short build, long droopy ears, and dark curly har. Their chest is small and they have thick legs. The comic opens with a high up shot, looking down at an angle on Abby mid-rummage in their refrigerator with an egg carton in their hand before looking over at their cellphone vibrating on their kitchen counter.
"Hello?" They ask into their phone with their other hand still holding the egg carton.
"ABBY!!!" A voice exclaims through the phone so loudly that it sends Abby's ears flying in the opposite direction.

div.p:
Christine is ready to become a parent, but is it ever so simple?
Todays comic is a slice of autobio, a snippet in-between; a queer person exploring what pregnancy means to themselves and the world around them. Hope you love it as much as we do!

Thank you so much Christine for the lovely piece. Christine was a here a few years ago talking about what being nonbinary meant to them! It’s a lovely little comic that goes great with this one today! Once your done reading, make sure to let Christine know they’re awesome-sauce!

We’re still holding our breathe with regards to all of the chaos and law-shenanigans and social-media-madness, that has been 2025. With things being so turbulant we’ve still not made plans for a Pledge Drive; just living week to week, and that feels like a victory.

If you’d like to see us continue along strong. Come and support us at the cost of a coffee each month. Or if that’s too steep; come and follow us on one of our newer socials. We’ve been loving our time at Bluesky; if you haven’t jumped ship yet; come on in, the water is fine.

div.script: <!-- function toggle_expander(id) { var e = document.getElementById(id); if(e.style.height == 'auto') e.style.height = '1px'; else e.style.height = 'auto'; } //-->

div.div:
Christine Suggs draws in a soft, cartoony style with a textured line and mostly flat, bright colors.
Page 1
Caption: Visiting my parents' house.
"You abut ready to head out?" Calls a voice through the bathroom door.
"Yeah, one sec-" Christine replies as they tousle their shock of spiky black hair on the top of their head, admiring their reflection in the bathroom mirror. They are a nonbinary plus size Mexican American person in a yellow collared button-down shirt and jeans.
A gross red "GOOSH" sound effect fills the air, causing Christine to flinch and blush.
Christine unbuckles their pants, shimmying them downwards to the tile floor.
Caption: Thanks to my birth control, it's been nearly five years since my last period.
The panel crops in on their bare lower legs that have a smattering of hair and little tattoos on them, their jeans pooling around their feet.
"OH." Christine exclaims.
Page 2
Caption: Recently my husband and I made the decision to start trying for kids. And here I was, in my parents' house feeling like a pre-teen.
Tentatively, Christine pokes their head out from the bathroom door, calling, "Uh, Mom? Could you come here a minute?"
Caption: Of course, things were a little different this time around.
"Do you think a panty liner will work?" Christine's mom asks while offering one in her hand. She is a Mexican woman with chin length black hair. The caption "Post Menopause" helpfully points at her with a little arrow.
Laughingly, Christine reaches out to accept the sanitary pad, saying, "It'll have to!"
Page 3
Caption: It felt right that it happened now, after spending a weekend with my family.
Christine's rolling luggage and backpack sit to the side as they hug their mother, saying "Bye, Mom!"
To which their Mom replies, "Love you."
"Drive safe." Their father, a plus size white man with a white flat top, tells Christine's brother with a friendly clap on the shoulder.
"Will do." Grady, their brother responds, one hand on his backpack shoulder strap. He is a plus size Mexican American person with thick black hair and glasses.
Caption: My brother, as always, was working hard to get my parents to use the right pronouns for me.
Behind the driver's wheel in the car, Grady asks, "Ready?"
"YES." They reply as they pull the seat belt across their chest. Their words are spoken with confidence but their face looks panicked, with a little sweat drop rolling down their temple.
Caption: Like most of my trips to my small and conservative hometown, I simmered in anxiety. This time I brought a few new ones.
Christine looks contemplatively out the car window as the sky and hillside roll by. The scene outside the window fills up with their internal worries, reading, "What will your baby even call you? What if they never stop misgendering you?? How will your body change?"
Page 4
Caption: Coming home is my favorite feeling. It's the place I feel most powerful and at ease.
Christine stands on the walkway leading to their home, waving to their brother's car as he drives away. Their brick house has a brown picket fence, green lawn, and both a cactus and a shrubby bush just to the side of the entrance steps. A big Progress Pride flag hangs proudly over the front door, showing both the traditional rainbow stripes with the newer addition of the back, brown, blue, pink, and white chevrons with a purple O on a yellow triangle.
Caption: I worked so hard to buy this house, a lot of it with the money I got from my book deal.
As Christine pulls their roll-y bag towards the house, they smile up at the flag and then let themself in through the front door.
"ARF!! ARF!!!" A medium-sized point-eared dog barks enthusiastically as it jumps up to greet Christine.
"Didja miss me, buddy?" They ask their dog, giving it a friendly scratch on the back of its neck.
Caption: Home is where I feel ready to be a parent.
"mrrrrowww!" Their cat ginger cat howls, not even letting Christine take off their backpack yet.
Page 5
Caption: Over the coming months I'd deal with heavy bleeding, iron deficiencies, rampant hormones, and all the buzzing excitement that comes with trying to have a child.
In the bathroom, Christine (who finally got to take off their backpack) pulls out a box of pads from under the sink.
Caption: And then there's pregnancy: That scry and mysterious experience that will forever change the body I've worked so hard to love.
With calm serenity, Christine pulls their button-up yellow shirt over their head, exposing their gray sports bra, hairy armpits, and belly with subtle pink stripes curving down the sides.
Caption: There's so many more conversations I need to have with doctors and family about my body, my gender, and its boundaries.
Now changed into soft jammies, Christine turns on their stove to heat their kettle. They wear a fluffy pink cardigan with red hearts, a gray crop top, and blue stripped sweatpants.
"Hey, I missed you! Calls their partner's voice from off panel.
Caption: But for now I am home, And somehow, I am ready to welcome a child into our little world.
Their partner, Kyle, leans down to kiss the top of Christine's head with a little "smeck!" and a side hug. He is a tall plus size white man with medium brown hair.
"I missed you too." They reply with a smile as they bring their tea mug to their lips.
Transcribed on February 23, 2025 by Erika Moen for ohjoysextoy.com

Something Sweeter by Pigeon, published February 11, 2025 on ohjoysextoy.com/something-sweeter-pigeon
With a color palette of muted maroons, beiges, pinks, browns, and teal, Pigeon illustrates this Rocco comic with delicate, lacy details.

She has flowing, long and dark hair, styled into an extravagant rococo-style hairdo.
Big eyes with long eyelashes and a dreamy gaze. Soft lips with a hint of smile and a few beauty spots on her face. The noticeable features are also her well-pronounced cheekbones and nose. Tall and slender, and her skin is dark and smooth.
She wears white stockings tied with blue ribbons and shiny blue shoes adorned with bows. On her neck we can see a sheer lace choker decorated with a string of pearls. Similar irregular pearls are visible in her earrings and decorating her hair.
"Cake, mylady?" Asks her maid as she offers her an ornate tray with four suggestive teal cakes displayed on it. Each palm-size cake is a teal half-sphere with light pink icing decorating the base and a twirled dollop of dark pink icing on top, resembling four colorful breasts presented on a tray beneath the apron-clad ample bosom of the maid.
The perspective moves to the opposite side of the room, where we see the Lady regarding the maid hungrily from her bed and, in the foreground, we now see that the curvy maid is ONLY wearing her apron, leaving her backside entirely exposed to us. The big loose bow made by the apron strings brushes against her full curvy figure.
She is a mix of auburn and brown, braided and neatly pinned up, crowned with a white maid band on the top of her head. A multitude of freckles cover her face and arms, complementing her warm complexion.
Page 2
Revealing her face for the first time, we now see that the maid has a playful expression on her face, with her thick eyebrows, round nose and well pronounced lips.
"Hmm. I suppose that'll do." The Lady coos back, Her white pear tear-drop shaped earrings and lace collar contrast elegantly against her dark skin.
"Well then..." The maid says as she climbs onto the plush bed with her tray of treats balanced in one hand as the other uses her Lady's thigh to balance herself.
Without moving, the Lady remains nestled among her frilly, silky pillows as the maid hands a single cake to her. The way that the maid wrests her forearm along the center of the Lady's torso and the way she's partially crouched over her legs shows us this is a practiced intimacy between the two.
"mmmm" The Lady purrs as she parts her lips for the treat that her maid feeds to her.
Looking directly into her eyes, the maid asks with a sultry expression, "Am I allowed one as well?" She rests her hand just below her Lady's breast.
"I... Yes." The Lady responds, with a round cake balanced on her chest, just above her own full round breasts. A triumvirate of nipples is created between the Lady's own deep mahogany ones and the cake's bright pink icing topping. "I'll allow it." She concludes.
Straddling her Lady, the maid brings her face just between her mistress's breasts and coos, "Beautiful..." while looking deeply into her eyes.
"aAH..." The Lady reacts as the maid uses the tip of her tongue to encircle her nipple.
Page 3
The maid raises her head up again to take a bite out of the teal cake that she now holds in her hand, while she still props the length of her body against the Lady's. The Lady, in turn, palms her maid's cheek with her hand while she chews, moaning, "Mmm..."
"I don't know, dear." The Lady says, lifting the maid's chin with her hand. "I think I need something... sweeter." To which the maid dives in for a full kiss, her tongue caressing the other's.
Pulling back just far enough to speak, the maid asks "How about this?"
"Ah... Yes. Much better." The Lady replies, nose-to-nose with her maid and looking hungrily into her eyes.
Bringing her lips close to her Lady's ear, the maid whispers, "You can have ME for dessert."
Page 4
Confidently, the Lady replies, "With pleasure."
In one deft movement, the maid raises herself up to her knees which straddle the Lady on either side, while pulling back her apron's skirt to reveal her smooth pussy which hovers for a second just barely higher than her Lady's nose.
With both hands, the Lady grabs the space just between her maid's butt cheeks and thighs, pulling her lower body onto her hungry mouth. "Ooh!" the maid gasps as she grabs tightly onto the pillows that surround her Lady's head.
At first delicately, she licks between her lips with the tip of her tongue, eliciting gentle "aaahh!"s and "nnNNgH!"s until she dives in deeply, pulling her maid's bottom half hard onto her face. "MMMMH!" The maid groans, rocking her body against her mistress' mouth.
Page 5
A while later we find the two women splayed out on their backs across the bed cover. Their hair is disheveled, leaving elegantly curled locks splayed along the rumpled satin sheets. The tray of partially eaten cakes sits discarded but just within reach. In pure relaxation and contentment, they sigh.
Sitting up at the edge of the bed, the Lady announces, "Hm. I suppose it's time for us." Her maid follows suit.
Now clad in a loose dour dark dress with long sleeves and a white basic blunt frill around the edges, the lady pulls her hair up into a bun.
"Let me help." Her maid says, as she pulls her own matching dark dress up over her shoulders.
"There." Says the maid, closing the final button on the back of her "Lady's" working-class dress. "It's such a shame-"
"To go back to work?" The "Lady" asks her companion, the both of them now fully dressed in their modest maid's uniforms, complete with white aprons. Making the bed, she continues, "I know... But the lady is going away again next week..."
Over the tray of half-eaten cakes, we hear her say, "...Until next time, my love."

div.div:
All About Gags by Elisa2B published Jan. 28, 2025 on ohjoysextoy.com
Eli (they/them) draws with a vibrant, bouncy, cartoony style using a wide palette of colors. Everything about their art is energetic. The backgrounds reverberate with bold colors, sometimes using half-toned dots and other times as abstract shapes.
"nnNNN!" Sounds off a gagged Eli while bound with crisscrossing ropes to a wooden chair. Big, cartoony sweat drops fly off them from their effort to fight against their restrictions. They have multiple facial piercings, tattoos, and a dirty blonde mullet down to their shoulders with a big poof of bangs. A thick black collar with an O-ring fills up most of their neck and they wear a dark T-shirt with a giant gray star in the center, knee-length shorts, and thick cherry red work boots. A hint of short, soft hairs grows on their exposed legs and a smattering on their tummy.
Title: All About Gags a comic by Eli2B.
"MmPFNGH!" They struggle against their bounds. "nnNNNN"
Finally, they spit out their gag with a "PHWAH!"
"Gags!" They announce, with their demeanor completely transformed to that of a cool, calm, proud lecturer. "Of all BDSM things, they're definitely my favorite. And they've always been!" Stars of pride sparkle around their head.
Page 2
An assortment of different gags is displayed across the top of the page while Eli's chibi-fied face explains, "I've never had a moment when I saw someone and that was my sexual awakening. But something did awaken me, and that was GAGS! As soon as I saw one I couldn't stop thinking about it."
Most of the gags on display feature a buckled strap that goes around the sides and back of a person's head, while the front center section attaches to an object that fits into the mouth.
The gags displayed are:
- Bite gag: The gag is simply a cylindrical length of solid silicone with a bulb at either end.
- Bone gag: Same, but the bulbs on either end of the silicone length are doubled, to resemble a cartoony bone.
- Ball gag: The straps attach to a big round silicone ball.
- Spider gag: A metal O-ring with prongs is attached to the straps.
- Dick gag: A short, fat phallus is the gag, designed to point inwards of the recipient's mouth.
- Muzzle gag: The design of this one is different from the previous ones, with a top and bottom set of straps that support a flat square-ish piece of material that would cover the recipient's nose and mouth like a mask.
- Inflatable gag: Using no straps at all, this gag resembles a pacifier that the user would hold in their mouth. A squeezey-ball and tube attach to the front of the pacifier. As the ball is squeezed, it pushes air through the tube into the flexible shape on the inside of the pacifier, inflating it to become the gag.
The little chibi face of Eli narrates as it floats around an enormous, more-realistic illustration of themself with duct tape wrapped over their mouth. The big Eli looks calm and peaceful.
"And of course, by the time that I got into them the first time I already knew what I wanted to do! In every porn I ever watched I loved to see how cozy the actors looked when duct tape would wrap their head, jamming their jaw shut. I wanted to feel that."
The duct tape extends up over the top of their head, creating a tight cap over the dome of their head. The ends of the tape are sliced to resemble friendly fingers, reaching up and over to engulf their head.
"I wanted my face hugged by hands of tape too."
An off-screen voice says, "Stomp your feet if something is wrong, babe!"
"mh-hm!" Eli nods serenely.
Page 3
Taking a more serious expression, the chibi Eli face tells us, "And I know that's not how it looks to some people. There can be this 'hardcore' vibe surrounding the practice of gagging someone."
A naked person is on all fours with a cartoonishly oversize tear drop by their eye. The rest of their face and posture are calm, so we know they are not actually in real distress. Their teeth bite down on a bone gag, their hands are in rounded gloves without fingers, a proud pony tail protrudes from their butt, they wear pointed animal ears on top of their head, and their neck is completely enclosed in a thick collar that is attached to a leash being held tightly by their companion.
"Suffer, you helpless fucker." Declares their companion, holding the leash taut in one hand while gripping the top of the submissive partner's head in the other. The dominant companion balances on one foot as they plant the other one firmly on the submissive's butt like a step stool. The dominant's eyes light up with stars and they smile devilishly as they laugh, "hehe"
"And don't get me wrong, I love hardcore BDSM..." Elisa2B's chibi head continues. "...but that's not what I like about gags!"
The chibi head now floats through a more realistic scene in a bedroom. Miscellanea litters a blue bedspread with a star pattern. A handheld gaming console's screen shows a cartoony BDSM scene of a cat-hooded person licking a kind of zippered device. A stuffed toy cat rests by the pillow, along with a phone, cords, pencil, hair tie, and assorted little objects. Front and center of the scene is a person bound and gagged on the bed, with another person's hand gently resting on the side of their head. The bound person wears a muzzle gag that completely obscures their mouth. Two thick straps bind them around their shoulders and just below their breasts to restrict their forearms, which are tied behind their back.
"It's the feeling of shutting down the only way out for your thoughts. That's what does it for me." Explains the mini Eli head, looking fondly at the bound person. "The tenderness at play. Both in receiving and giving."
Page 4
Floating into a new scene, mini Eli explains, "Every step of it feels sacred."
A different, more realistically-drawn person now fills up the top of the page. This person's arms are also bound behind them, but this time by shibari ropes. The person sits upright, looking up reverentially, reminiscent of a saintly portrait, as another set of hands gently pushes a rounded wad of material into the recipient's mouth.
"It can be intensely sexual," Eli's chibi head says, looking on as the model's head is now duct taped. We are standing over the bound person from behind, looking down on them as the offscreen partner's one hand pulls the roll of duct tape tightly around the kneeling person's head and the other hand firmly holds their shoulder in a move that is both bracing and supportive. "But it feels kinda spiritual too."
Narration: Time falls still and there's nothing but bliss.
In a very closely-cropped in panel, then hands tighten the knot of a pink and blue-patterned kerchief under the gagged person's chin. A blue fabric has also been tied over the duct tape on their mouth.
"There we go." The voice belonging to the hands says.
"MmPH!" The gagged person replies.
"Perfect." Says the voice.
The camera pulls back to reveal from an overhead shot that Eli (in their realistic form) is the one tying up the gagged partner. They hold their partner's head gently in their hands as they say, "No way you will even remotely open your mouth now. Such a good boy."
"nMnh..." The bound person murmurs, closing their eyes contentedly and leaning their cheek into Eli's hands.
The mini Eli chibi head continues, "The only tension left is purely, unambiguously erotic. For me, it's more than just comforting. It's cathartic. It's the place where all worries cease to exist."
Page 5
Returning to the opening scene of the comic, we rejoin Eli with their white gag pulled just below their chin.
"SO!" They announce, unaware of the shadowing figure looming behind them with menacing stars for eyes. "This is why, on a desert island, gags are the one thing I'd bring with mMMH!" They are cut short as a red ball gag suddenly flies into their mouth.
"Didn't expect you to get out of that one so easily!" Coos Zoe, Eli's bespeckled partner. While their one hand adjusts Eli's shibari ropes, the other hand removes the white gag from around their chin. Zoe has shoulder length wavy brown-red hair, long eyelashes, tattoos, and sports a white tank top.
"mh-HM! nNN" Eli replies dreamily, their eyes closing in peace as little bubbles of zen-like happiness float near their face.
Lovingly,Zoe says, "Don't worry, I got you. Be nice and wait for me while I cook you dinner, ok?"
"m!" Chrips Eli.
"Such a good boy! ♥" Zoe commends them.
The slobbery white gag is left on the floor next to the words, "Thanks 4 reading!"
Transcribed January 27, 2025 by Erika Moen

Making changes to how I dress to at least be gendered differently came at the cost of my favorite wardrobe pieces, but I’m staying hopeful that one day I’ll don […]

div.div:
Finding yourself in transition is a journey. To quote the lovely Dolly Parton: if you want the rainbow, you gotta put up with the rain!
Making changes to how I dress to at least be gendered differently came at the cost of my favorite wardrobe pieces, but I’m staying hopeful that one day I’ll don a skirt again. Whether that takes time, change, a heckton of bravery, or all three has yet to be seen. In the end, if gender is fluid, then I may just be okay with whatever pronoun the rain throws at me.
Ripleys Links!
BlueSky
Here on OJST!
Matthew’s Added Note
What a lovely and powerful comic. A reminder to any of you who made it to the bottom here, that OJST is in constant need of support, in order to make comics like these! Whether it’s a supporting us on Patreon, following us on Bluesky or sharing a comic – every little helps!
