Finally a huge thank you to the FSC team this past week, for a really good showing at the Supreme Court. Keeping our fingers crossed the top-dog’s see sense! Was genuinely proud to be advocated for with such skill.
<!-- function toggle_expander(id) { var e = document.getElementById(id); if(e.style.height == 'auto') e.style.height = '1px'; else e.style.height = 'auto'; } //-->
↓ Comic Transcript
Ripley LaCross draws in a simplified-realistic cartoon-ish style, using a color palette of white, gray, black, and blue. The present-day scenes look digitally drawn, with crisp, smooth lines. The philosophical scenes have a much more watercolored look to them with softer, pencil-y lines.
Page 1
From an overhead point of view, we see an office party taking place in a warehouse-turned-office building. Rain pelts down against the enormous windows that stretch up to the ceiling. Guests mill around tables of potluck food. It's an all-ages gathering, so parents try to talk with the other adults while simultaneously keeping track of their small children who are making friends with the office dogs. In the center of the hubbub stands Ripley who is talking with another person. Ripley's hair is bushy with the sides shaved down to stubble, making a relaxed mohawk or dapper mullet. They wear a black blazer over their collared blue shirt, with black pants and boots, with skinny glasses topping them off. They sport various facial and ear piercings along with a hint of mustache and beard against their white skin tone. Their conversation partner is shorter and plumper in a cute black mini cardigan over their blue patterned boxy dress that comes down to their knees. Underneath they sport black tights with their two-toned retro shoes. They wear slim glasses and theirs ears are full of many piercings that pop against their gray skin tone. They short black hair shares a cluster of big curls in front and then quickly fades into a buzz.
"Some shingdig, eh?" Ripley asks their friend. "I'm loving your outfit, by the way."
"Oh, I'm glad you like it!" The friend enthuses. The camera now drops down to an eye-level view of our speakers. "It was a last-minute thing, really." They manage to strike a little pose to show it off without spilling their drink. "This dress has a great pattern, but... it's actually on backwards! I figure this higher neckline and flatter cut gives me the shape and vibe I'm looking for. Though the tag's a bit itchy around my throat. Oh, the choices we *gender revels* make for fashion, haha!"
"Well, you still look great!" Replies Ripley. "Kinda makes me wish I could wear skirts again!"
With a look of realization, the friend asks, "Oh yeah! You used to wear them all the time, didn't you? Was it the dysphoria? Or...?"
The narrator's caption reads, "Ah... not entirely" over a smudging streak of blue that could either be the water running down a window pane or the view going into a softer, pulled-back focus to transition to another time.
Page 2
The entire white page is cut with a grey-blue watercolor pathway that snakes across and down it. The art style is the same as the previous page, but instead of crisp, clear digitally-drawn linework, it looks like everything is drawn with a softer pencil and painted with blue-gray watercolor paint on textured paper. Far in the distance at the start of the path is a hunched over, indistinct figure walking in baggy, ratty jeans and a hoody pulled up over their bushy, scraggly hair. Infinitesimally closer is the same figure, but now standing more upright, their bushy, short hair uncovered. They fidget with their fingers while continuing to walk forward, but now they are in a boxy knee-length skirt, fishnets, and big chunky boots. Music plays faintly in the background. The next figure continuing the walk wears a beret underneath big headphones that connect to a music player inside their purse. They wear a tanktop with a long skirt and flipflops. The next figure is close enough to show their face a little clearer now. Their shin-length hair flairs in almost-curls at the ends and they lift their multi-playered skirts to avoid tripping while they walk. They are clearly at a special event because they wear a pearl necklace with long opera gloves and fancy little high heels. This leads to the person with bangs and long hair that goes down past their shoulders. They wear a choker and multiple strands of necklaces. Their hands hold the straps of their backpack that they wear over their open, fluttering collared button-up shirt that flutters around their tight tanktop that tops their calf-length ruffled skirt and thick sandals.
Narration: After the mess that was my teens, I wore skirts just as often as I did pants well into my thirties.
Decked out in Scene/Raver gear, Ripley takes a photo (with a slim camera) of the their next incarnation ahead of them. The picture-taking Ripley has big springy tubes added in their hair, wears round tinted classes, knee-high striped socks, canvas sneakers, a knee-length skirt with tanktop, a short scarf wrapped around their neck and lots of little bracelets.
Narration: They kissed the earth, tickled my knees, and hugged my thighs.
The figure, who is now recognizably Ripley, poses for the camera with a joyful twirl in a fluffy knee-length wedding dress with a bouquet of flowers in their hand. Their long wavy hair bounces with the movement while their flowered fascinator holds the top in place.
Narration: I celebrated their simplicity, their comfort, and my right to choose them.
Ripley hikes confidently along the trail, their hair in that bushy/shaved main from the first page but wearing an enormous camping backpack over their t-shirt. Their handkerchief is tied around their neck and they use two walking poles as they march in their hiking boots. Their knee-length cargo skirt reveals the scuffs on their lower legs.
Narration: Even after coming out as agender, skirts still felt like freedom.
Ripley is much closer to the camera now, looking up in the air in surprise as rain starts to fall. Their hair is beginning to grow out from a buzzcut and they wear an N95 mask over their face and a pendant necklack rests against their chest. An unopened umbrella is tucked under their arm, resting against the knee-length, armless, pocketed dress they're wearing. Puddles from the rain are forming by their practical but stylish sandals.
Narration: I don't have a gender and neither does clothing.
Looking up at the rain with worry, Ripley begins opening their umbrella. They have disheveled short hair, the same necklace, thick black boots, and wear a calf-length dress with short sleeves and a v-neck.
Page 3
Against the white background, Ripley huddles under their umbrella that is labelled "THEY/THEM/THEY/THEM/THEY/THEM" in blocky text while softly-written "She" and "He" words rain down against it in blue.
"It's tricky being under the nonbinary gender umbrella when your culture is still very binary." Explains Ripley to us, looking vulnerable as the hem of their dress begins to soak up some of the raining "She" and "Her" words that were not blocked by the umbrella. The rest of the water and pronouns build up into a puddle by their feet. "And despite my beliefs, skirts and dresses are still very much skewed to one side of that binary."
Framed within a comic panel border, Ripley tries to hold their dress up higher out of the collecting water, but it's already up to their thighs. "She" and "Her" leach up through the bottom of the dress, out of the pool of water that continues to fill from the relentless rain.
Narration: They were weighing me down. Anchoring me in the wrong gender through the eyes of strangers.
Back onto the open, blank page, Ripley falls to their knees in the puddle, their crumbpled umbrella tossed to the side and filling with rain itself. The gray blue watercolor rains down on everything as the bottom of Ripley's dress continues to absorb a dark inky blue from the puddle.
Page 4
Ripley's damaged but repaired THEY/THEM umbrella overlaps the comic panel's edge, shielding them as they sit on a tree stump. The dress is gone, replaced with a t-shirt, jeans, boots, and a large-beaded necklace. The rain continues to pour down but the damaged umbrella keeps them covered and the tree stump keeps them elevated out of the water. They look over their shoulder with an expression of displeasure.
Narration: It felt like betrayal- rejecting what I love simply because of what other people may think of me. What happened to my rebellious spirit? My stubborn nature?
From overhead, we look down over Ripley as they look up at us defiantly, saying, "Regardless, I still get misgendered on the regular. But how much more often would it happen if I dressed the way I used to? The way I want to?" A giant "S H E" rain drop splashes against their hand that shields their eyes.
Back on level ground, we see Ripley from behind, still sitting on their tree stump with the umbrella handle balanced against their shoulder and neck so both their hands are free to clean their glasses. The rain pelts down, but they're still just high enough to be out of the puddle.
Narration: Some folks tolerate it better than others. Others embrace it. Every day we each make choices for our own comfort, and this is mine.
In the distance, a flurry of people dance and frolic in the rain with their own umbrellas.
Page 5
The top quarter of the page is broken up into three distinct panels horizontally to each other.
The first panel contains the caption "Nevertheless..." with a view of a hand reaching down to Ripley under their umbrella, who in turn looks up at the hand in confusion.
The second panel is borderless against the white of the full page. From a distance, we see a new character, Eivor, standing confidently in the rain with their own THEY/THEM/SHE/HER/HE/HIM umbrella held aloft while the other hand reaches towards the seated Ripley who still huddles under their own repaired umbrella while sitting on the tree stump.
The borders return for the third panel, which shows their two hands reach for each other, their fingertips barely meeting over the caption, "...It maybe not be today, tomorrow, or even the day after that."
One single rectangular panel stretches across the width of the page, showing a close-up of Ripley's booted shoes firmly jumping into the puddle with a SPLASH that escapes the panel boundaries.
A medium-sized rectangular panel intersects with the previous splash, showing Ripley outside of a building, looking at it through one of the giant paned windows. The art is back to being crisp and digitally drawn. Inside the building, everyone is dancing in the rain with their pronoun umbrellas. Ripley's umbrella is nowhere to be seen, so the rain pelts down on their black blazer jacket.
Narration: But someday I'll feel free to weather the storm however I choose.
Once again, all panel borders disappear, revealing a blank white page as a small Ripley briskly struts through the shallow puddles to the far right side of the page. The rain continues, but Ripley looks confident under their umbrella. "Who knows!" They say to us with a smile. "I may grow to like the rain and my umbrella. Gender can be fluid, afterall."
Transcribed by Erika Moen on January 19, 2025 for ohjoysextoy.com

If you’re getting ready for tax season and find yourself with a bit of excess green; please think about sporting the comic – it’s the only way we can keep making these comics week to week.

div.p: If you read DarkChibiShadow’s comic for us about a trans guy’s first BJ and wondered, “Huh, why’s his junk look like that?,” then you’ll see yourself in this comic, which explains what happens to genitals on testosterone HRT! It’s pretty easy to find before/after transition photos online, but people usually keep their pants on for them. As a person considering medically transitioning, it can be difficult to know what to expect downstairs, which is a place we don’t often want surprises. Let DCS demystify that for you!

Matt’s Added Note
Happy New Years friends! I wanted to round off the blog post with a note; DCS has a bunch of extra sexy comics to find elsewhere, and a brand new one that I can’t recommend enough. End the year with a pop (AND if you get it super sharpish during the winter sale, 50% off!) It’s a whole lot of comic and super sexy fun. Very much recommended.

New Year is a great time to follow us on our current socials, or heck… dropping us some support for the comic if you haven’t done so before! We only exist with your follows, clicks, shares and generosity. Want MORE DarkChibiShadow comics? ME TOO – support us and I promise to try to make it happen!

For this transcript, anatomical terms will be used to describe the images. If that may bother you, please take care.
DarkChibiShadow draws in a bouncy cartoony style with a color palette of soft teals, blues, and pinks.
Page 1
A generic person with no distinguishable features, hair, or clothing taps DarkChibiShadow on the shoulder while they are bent over their dinner tray-sized tablet drawing. "Hey!" The Generic Person (TGP) says aimiably. "Are you working on that comic again?"
DarkChibiShadow looks up from their hunched drawing position with a surprised smile. They have a bushel of spikey hair, thick eyebrows, rectangular glasses, and wear a dark t-shirt. "Yeah, just finishing up actually..."
The tablet's screen is filled with an illustration of a naked person sitting with their legs spread, cropped to their belly, thighs, and pubic area, which features a protruding fold of puffy flesh that would fit in a cupped hand. The figure has a smattering of hair over their thighs, pubic mound, and swoop of it running up the underside of their tummy.
"Y'know, I was wondering:" TGP asks, pointing at the illustration. "why is his clit so big?"
"Oh," DarkChibiShadow replies, now turning full toward their companion. "that's cuz he's taking testosterone."
Another illustration now shows two fingers of the same hand pressed on either side of a fleshy, puffy, testosterone-supplemented vulva that is accentuated with sparkling stars. The genitalia puffs out away from the body, about the size and shape of a cupped hand. Between the labia majora (the outer lips) rises up the clitoral hood, clitoris, and labia minora (inner, smaller lips). The clitoris and clitoral hood protrude far above the rest of the vulva, resembling the shape of a skinny, conical tent, with the clitoris at the very top and the labia minora running down one side.

In aw, TGP exclaims, "Whoa! It really does look like a 1-inch cock, doesn't it?"
DarkChibiShadowhastens to add, "Everyone is different, so be sure to double check in the future before referring to their bits!"
A little flustered, TGP blushes and quickly covers their mouth in self-consciousness, replying, "Oh, okay! Will do!"
Page 2
With their chin in their hands and still looking flustered, TGP continues, "I guess I knew less about this than I thought..."
"Everyone starts somewhere." DarkChibiShadow says with a scholarly air as they grasp the pull-string on a rolled-up projector screen over their head. "Since you're here, let's keep learning!"
The projector screen unfurls to reveal diagrams of different vulvas with accompanying little hearts floating around them.
Title: Effects of testosterone on the genitals include...
DarkChibiShadow Narration: Clitoris (T-dick*) grows larger! The internal structure enlarges too! T-dick can now become a lot harder than before. A literal erection!
*The "T" in "T-Dick" can stand for either "testosterone" or "trans" depending on who you ask.
Title: Before Testosterone
Diagram: A generic vulva nestled between spread legs. The labia majora puffs a little bit away from the body to create a small mound with two gummy-worm-sized labia minora lips running down the center. The lips are merged at the top for the clitoral hood (which hides the clitoris beneath it) and the lips part towards the bottom, revealing a peek of the vaginal entrance hole beneath.
Title: On Testosterone
Diagram: The same vulva as the previous diagram, but everything about it has been puffed up about two to three times bigger. The clitoral hood has grown from the width of a gummy worm to the width of a finger, with a marble-sized clitoris siting high above the rest of the vulva. The labia minora and majora have increased in size and meatiness as well, all extending plumply away from the body.
DarkChibiShadow's Narration continues: Vaginal opening may become dryer or tighter. More pubic hair or thicker hair growth. Sensitivity may decrease or change in some way!
TGP stands at the bottom of the page, looking up at the giant screen projector diagrams, and asks, "So, how much growth should someone expect?"
"It depends!" Answers DarkChibiShadow, their hand still holding the pull-string of the screen. "The amount of testosterone may sometimes affect growth, but usually this is all genetic lottery."
Page 3
Gesturing at a series of six different testosterone-supplemented genitals, DarkChibiShadow declares, "The average amount of growth is somewhere between 1/4th of an inch to 1 inch (1cm - 4cm) and sometimes more!
Different parts are accentuated or shrunk on each set of genitals. Some more closely resemble standard penis and scrotum-shapes in a small size, while others resemble puffed-up standard vulva shapes, with some other examples of genital shapes and sizes falling in between the two extremes.
A hand gentle squeezes a large clitoris with thick hood-shaft between the forefingers while DarkChibiShadow narrates, "This growth can allow for a stroking motion and for folks to better receive oral that resembles what we typically think of as a blowjob."
An over-head shot shows a person sitting on the edge of their seat with their legs spread, t-dick puffed out proudly on display. The model's hand rests on the top of the head of a pink haired person who is at eye-level with the t-dick, looking at it dreamily before they put it in their mouth.
"Some people may even be able to achieve penetration, depending on their size and what they're trying to penetrate. Some surgeries can help with this too." DarkChibiShadow's narration continues over more examples of a t-dick in action. One shows someone pressing their t-dick against their partner's vulva. Somebody else uses a sheath to stroke along their t-dick. Another person person presses their fingers on either side of the base of their t-dick, while stroking it against their partner's vulva.
Still looking scholarly, DarkChibiShadow adds, "Still, lots of transmasc people choose to use a strap-on or prosthetic dick during sex." Behind them is an illustration of the lower region of a person wearing a strap-on harness with a bigger dick secured to it. "It all depends on the person's comfort."
"Sure, I get that!" TGP enthuses.
Page 4
DarkChibiShadow stands before us, flexing triumphantly and stating, "Personally, I didn't start T until I was 30 because of my own baggage, gender dysphoria and frankly, my own biases that made starting difficult. But, I owed it to myself to at least try, and wow, I'm happy I did! The changes testosterone has brought to my body have been amazing."
Now looking defeated, they sigh, "There are still things I wish were different about my body..." In the background we can see into their thoughts as they imagine the lower half of a naked person presenting a large t-dick that hangs past their pubic area. "But that's a feeling many people share, I'm sure."
Now crossing their arms into an X, they assert, "And remember, having gender dysphoria about your genitals like I do is not a universal experience for all trans people!"
Page 5
Over a montage of many different kinds of people and their t-dicks, DarkChibiShadow narrates, "Lots of transmascs love what they've already got and don't even take testosterone in the first place! Everyone has a different approach to how they do or don't want to transition, different words they prefer for themselves, and a unique relationship with their body. Every trans person is their own individual and you can't assume what's going on in their head."
Some of the people shown have had top surgery, some look typically masculine, some have breasts, some look feminine, some look androgynous, one wears cat ears with their pink wavy hair and collar, another wears a a leather pup play mask, balled gloves without fingers and a chest harness, one sports a butt plug along with their pierced labia minora, and another has both nipples pierced along with a small gauge in their ear lobe. Giant t-dicks of all shapes and sizes fill in the empty spaces between the models.
"Of course!" Declares TGP, thumping their chest with their fist. "And thanks, I've learned a lot!"
"You're welcome!" replies DarkChibiShadow, now sitting back at their tablet display.
"Now, about that comic..." TGP begins to say.
"Oh, right!" Chirps DarkChibiShadow, spinning their monitor around to show the comic they had been working on at the start of this story.
Todays comic was transcribed as a group effort around 12/29/24

div.div:
Ripley LaCross delivers with todays super fun festive comic. We hope your all having a great holiday-season, staying warm and unwrapping many ‘gifts‘!
Ripleys Links!
BlueSky
Here on OJST!
Erika and I are hunkering down, doing a few social things, and generally trying to stay warm; it’s a constant battle!
Have a wonderful week friends. Stay warm, wear lingerie for the ones you love, and, if you’re feeling extra charitable – come and support us on Patreon ;)
<!-- function toggle_expander(id) { var e = document.getElementById(id); if(e.style.height == 'auto') e.style.height = '1px'; else e.style.height = 'auto'; } //-->
↓ Comic Transcript
Ripley LaCross draws in a simplified-realistic cartoon-ish style, using a color palette of white, gray, black, and red.
A small red cabin sits in a small clearing in the woods. A thin foot trail cuts through the deep snow, leading to the door while snow gently falls from the sky.
"See?" Says a voice from inside the cabin. "Told ya' I knew where we were going!"
"Never doubted you for a second, darling!" Another voice replies from within.
Inside the cozy one-room cabin we see a pair of travelers pulling off their snow gear by the open door. It is cramped in a welcoming way, with a big bed covered in heavy plaid blankets, a free-standing wood stove with a kettle on top, a basic kitchenette, a simple dining table with chairs, and rustic artwork and tchotchkes for decoration, including a set of mounted antlers. The red curtains on the four sets of windows and one camping lamp on the table are the only pop of color in this otherwise grayscale scene.
"Brr!" Dahlia shivers, opening her puffy winter jacket to reveal her own snow overalls underneath. Taller than Ezra, she is a black trans woman in her early-30s with an orchiectomy and her shoulder-length hair of braided rows pulled back into a loose half-bun. "All of this is ours?" She asks.
"Sure is!" Ezra replies as he pulls off his stalking cap and unclips his snow overalls. A white trans man in his mid-30s, he has short cropped hair, the outline of a beard, modestly-sized black plugs in his earlobes, glasses, and big cushy knitted winter sweater. The snow on his discarded boots have left some white crumbles on the cabin floor. "The perfect holiday getaway, complete with unlimited solitude and firewood."
Striking a match which explodes into a red flame, Ezra kneels at the stove saying, "Well, the sooner we get a fire going the better. I'm freezing!"
"Alternatively..." Dahlia coos as she unclips one of the straps on her snow overalls, revealing the decorative straps of a bright red lingerie brasier underneath.
Ezra looks over his shoulder from the stove as she continues, "You could have your present... early." At this, the wood inside the stove ignites with a FWOOSH.
Page 2
Seductively, Dahlia strips off the rest of her protective snow overalls to reveal more of the lacy, strappy two-piece she's sporting. It's quite a contrast to see the elegant, decorative lingerie accentuating her curves combined with the thick, utilitarian snow pants and white and red winter socks that she still has on. The fire roars in the background.
"I thought we weren't doing gifts this year." Ezra smirks at her as he strokes her chin with his thumb.
"I changed my mind?" She blushes.
"Ah!" Gasps Dahlia when Ezra's hands make contact with her skin. "Your hands are FRIGID!"
"What other way is there to unwrap you?" He asks, playfully but confidently pushing her back onto the bedspread as she "Eeep!"s, she stockinged feet swept up off the floor.
Page 3
From Ezra's standing view, we look down to see Dahlia half laying on the bed with her arms propping up her top half. Her legs are spread and for the first time we see the entire lingerie set on display.
"Your mouth is warmer." She says while biting her lip and looking up at him coyly.
Taking off his glasses, he replies "Patience..." with a hungry smile. "...I want to take my time."
Over a trio of panels that cascade one into the other, Ezra reaches one hand up under her bra as he kisses above her breast. "A-ah..." She moans, and then gasps "Nh- Ah!" when he expertly pinches both of her nipples underneath their lacy cover. He gives her a moment of respite with a gentle kiss just above the top straps of her underwear.
Page 4
Tenderly he pinches the fabric between his fingers, pulling it up and off her pubic mound. "Is this also part of my present?" Ezra asks.
"It is." She replies earnestly with a look of eager anticipation and vulnerability. Little hearts surround her words.
"You know me so well." Replies Ezra with little hearts flurrying around his words as well as he takes the metal O-ring at the center of her panties in his teeth. The decorative straps strain as he pulls the ring away with his teeth.
"Ah!" Dahlia gasps. "OoOoohhhhh hhaa... Ahh!!" She moans as Ezra confidently laps away at her sex. She instinctively grabs the back of his head for support as she writhes.
Page 5
"Ooh oh! OoOOOooh!" The cries continue amid a flurry of hearts before both words and hearts are consumed in the roaring fire.
Next to the camping lamp on the table, we look across the room at our two lovers on the bed who are now recovering from their tryst. Dahlia reclines in just her bra and socks, the panties gone. Ezra, still fully clothed, leans near her with a hand on her leg. A festive holiday wreath with bobbles rings another set of decorative antlers high up on the wall.
"I can't believe you hiked the whole way here in lace." He laughs.
Resting her arms behind her head, Dahlia laughs, "What can I say? I'm a sucker for the dramatic."
The snow is picking up outside, the little red house stands as a tiny red point against the mounting white.
From inside, a voice says, "Well, I have a confession... I actually did get you something..."
Through the chimney comes a "BZZZZZZZZZ" sound.
"Aww, you shouldn't have!" The other voice declares from inside the cabin before it's lost to view from the snow-covered trees.
Transcribed by Erika Moen, December 23, 2024

div.div:
Lane draws with a stylized, cartoony clean, crisp line. The color palette has a kind of muted warm brown tone over everything.
The Cast:
Captain Higsby (He/Him) : A tall, chubby man with tan skin. His hair is a purple and curly, and his black mustache is done in two large points.
Page 1
Narration: Somewhere in the vast emptiness of space.
A red and blue chunky, angular spacecraft zips through the purple hue of space with two earth-like planets and another pink one in the distance.
"You just had to push this ol girl too hard, didn't ya?" A voice asks from inside the ship.
Inside the ship, we see Lt. Zex (They/Them) from their chin to their thighs. They are a pale, nonbinary person with bright, blue hair done in spikes. They are wearing a small pink halter top that only covers their breasts and a thong to match.
" 'We don't need the whole crew. We can pilot this rust bucket ourselves.' " Zex wails, mockingly. "Remember saying that, Captain?"
Only visible from his sweaty chest with pierced nipples down to the bulge in his gray boxer briefs, Captain Higsby answers, "You can't blame me for a faulty FTL drive! I can't believe you got me to agree to stealing this ship."
For the first time, we are given a full view of Zex and Higsby inside their ship. Their jumpsuits are strewn over the many consoles and operational controls while the two crew members sit on the floor sweating and in distress. Zex sits on their butt wears thick, purple tinted glasses and a single vertical stripe of blue lipstick that matches their eye shadow. In addition to their pink undergarments, they also wear knee-high striped socks to match. Higsby squats beside them, his hair is a purple and curly, and his black mustache is done in two large points. In addition to his boxers, he wears orange ankle-high socks.
"Apologies." Zex replies curtly. "With all the debt the crew is in, I didn't know we could be picky with jobs."
"We're in so much debt because you don't know how to pick jobs." He retorts.
"You wouldn't even have a crew if it wasn't for my charm and wit." They say, looking miserably hot and sweaty.
"How about we just drop this until the rest of the crew grabs us?" Higsby responds, looking the same. "Try and enjoy the little bit of cool air in here."
Page 2
Now looking mischievous, Zex strokes their chin thoughtfully and muses, "Higsby, if I didn't know better... I'd think you did this on purpose."

div.div:
Hien Pham tries out Naked Yoga in today’s comic, sharing with us something amazing. This isn’t just about shedding clothes, it’s about shedding judgment and embracing what’s underneath. Vulnerable, empowering, and freeing, this Bear bears it all.
Hien’s Blog Notes!
Thank you to Eric and Naked Yoga Australia for my first experience with naked yoga! Thank you to the OJST team who worked with me on this comic, and thank you to everyone who’s read my stuff this past year! I am extraordinarily grateful that you’re sticking with us through these chaotic times. Here’s to 2025 and another year of amazing OJST comics! P.S: naked yoga is very respectful toward everyone’s privacy, so all folks except myself in this comic are comic characters, and any similarity to real-life appearances is purely coincidental.
Portfolio
Interactive stuff
Patreon
Twitter
Sexy Comics
Here on OJST!
Matt’s Notes
I aught to make a real blog post about it – but this weekend I finally updated the website! With more and more higher DPI devices out there, we wanted to strip away a bunch of our sidebars and let the comic reign loud and proud. I hope you all like it? It’s been… a lot of work (the bones of this site are over 11 years old!) If you see errors or issues; feel free to ping me! I figure I’ll be ironing things out for a month or two.
In the mean time, can I tell you about our Patreon? ;D
It’s back UP, it’s WORKING! They couldn’t keep us down for long (if you were out of the loop, we’ve been on the receiving end of some banning/censorship on most of our platforms this past month!). Want to see me continue to hire artist to tell their intimate and amazing yoga stories? Consider committing to a coffee a month – and I promise to put it to good work!
Our Patreon! (you can follow us for free here too!)
<!-- function toggle_expander(id) { var e = document.getElementById(id); if(e.style.height == 'auto') e.style.height = '1px'; else e.style.height = 'auto'; } //-->
↓ Comic Transcript
As described by the artist; Hien Pham is a bearded, bald, fat Asian man wearing glasses and who has spots and scars on his butt.
He draws in a cartoon-y but realistically rendered style with the full spectrum of colors.
Page 1
A little nervously, Hien undoes the buttons of his red shirt and takes a glance over his shoulder. As he pulls down his white boxers we see that he is undressing in the back of a yoga studio, by the shelves for patrons belongings. In the foreground, he is framed by the arms and upper legs of two seated, hairy figures. One last time for luck, Hien quickly ruffles his fingers through his short beard hairs, gives them a gentle tug and then exhales calmly.
"Welcome, everyone, to naked yoga." Greets a voice off panel to the assembled variety of men sitting on their yoga mats on the floor. They have a diverse range of skin tones, builds, and body hair. Hien sits in the center of the group with his legs crossed and his hands resting over his ankles. He looks excited and nervous at the same time.
Page 2
"This is a non-sexual experience." The speaker continues. He has light brown skin, short curly/wavy brown hair, and a modest beard with mustache. We are given an overhead view of the yoga studio, which shows the men sitting on their yoga mats and their reflection in the wall-length mirror to the side. The studio is lined with leafy green plants that frame one side of the panel. "We are just a regular yoga class with the distinction that we're naked. I assure you that within five minutes of practicing, you'll almost forget that you're naked! This class is very much about dismantling body shame, and we are inclusive of all different body types. Things pop up from time to time, and if that happens, it's honestly fine to keep practicing. Or, you can lay on your belly, or return to Child's Pose, and things will usually resolves on their own.
"Doing this takes courage, and I admire everyone in the room for being here today." The instructor says as Hien leans back a little to take a peek at his reflection in the mirror.
Again, Hien nervously ruffles his fingers through his beard.
Narration: For someone who's written so many stories on body positivity and self-acceptance, I feel like I'm still fighting shame on a daily basis.
"We'll start on our knees, with our hands pushing parallel down from our shoulders..." The teacher instructs the class, who move onto all fours calmly and confidently, eyes closed- aside from Hien, who looks up anxiously at the instructor.
Narration: I feel so many things, so much, all of the time.
On all fours, Hien seems to be the only one swaying and wobbling amongst his still classmates.
Narration: Every little comment still gets to me. Everything still hurts so deeply.
Wobbling, Hien extends his left arm straight in front of him and his right leg behind, like the rest of the men around him. He closes his eyes in concentration.
Narration: The world at large continues to have a fascination with appointing a lack of morality to the width of my hip and the size of my penis.
In a close-up, we see Hien's elbow and thigh pull towards his center, while still balancing on his opposite hand and knee. Delicate traces of sweat roll along his body.
Narration: It's an argument that feels impossible to win.
From overhead, we focus on his hand that is planted firmly on the ground, pressing into his yoga mat, as he lightly quivers and sweats.
Page 3
Hien's narration floats across a montage of panels of him going through his yoga motions, all from different points of view. Some images we are above him, looking down, while others are close-ups at off-center angles.
Narration: I've never been to a yoga class before much less a naked one. I didn't realize how much of a respite it was.
On both knees, he keeps his hands planted in front of him and pulls his torso backwards, creating a prostrated bow.
Narration: In this space, I feel like a pressure is lifted. Like the necessity for my body to be a point of external interest, sexual or otherwise, is removed.
The tops of his feet press into the mat, supporting the weight of his butt with just a peek of balls hanging between them.
Narration: All that matters is how I can wield my body, what I can feel with, and within, it.
We join Hien close-up as he lets his head bow between his outstretched arms and the rest of his torso's weight pulled back over his bended knees. For the first time on this page, our view is parallel to him, not soaring overhead at odd angles. It's the first moment of balance we share with him.
The camera returns to an overhead, off-center, close-up view of him planting his feet on the mat and starting to straighten his legs while leaving his fingertips still resting on the floor. He still wobbles a little to keep his balance, but it's much more controlled than before.
Narration: I don't feel like I need to win any argument today.
Eyes closed and cheeks flushed, Hien exhales calmly as traces of sweat roll down him.
Page 5
Narration: During the Warrior's Pose, we all turn to face the mirror-lined wall.
The panel is divided vertically down the center, with the left showing the reflection of the rows of men in the mirror, and on the right are the real rows of men. We are behind them, so we see their full backs and butts.
Narration: I see the burn in my calves, the ache in my knees, the sweat beading down my face.
From just over Hien's ear, we follow his gaze over a classmate to find his own reflection in the mirror in the distance.
Narration: But most of all, I see a glimpse of a space that was carved out especially for me... A crowd of people who are already on my side...
Close in on Hien's reflection, he makes a silly face at himself- sticking out the tip of his tongue and giving himself a wink.
Narration: And I see a self that is mine, feeling perfectly fine naked.
Hien's back torso towers over us, filling up the entire bottom of the page. Our view is from the ground, looking up at his butt, back, spread arms, and the underside-back of his head with his hair pulled into a bun. Sweat delicately runs down his body but his body is no longer wobbling, he holds perfectly still and glows as if illuminated by the sunlight. He looks strong and solid and beautiful.
Transcribed by Erika Moen on December 9, 2024 for OhJoySexToy.com

div.p: Dive on into Eve Breng’s Showerhead Comic! Half instructional education, half sexy fun action, and all mermaid.
This is a real tour deforce; and is just such a pleasure to look at. Eve went all out, and we’re ever so excited to finally share it with you!

2024 is nearing it’s end, and gosh what a year. If you’ve been a little looped out; this month we’ve been trying to weather some sort of attack on our socials. Facebook, Instagram, Reddit, and even Patreon have been coming at us hard with some sort of censorship addenda. We’re still around, and with our Patreon back up; still alive and kicking! But it serves as a remidner; come and follow us on our other socials!
Bluesky
Mastodon
Pillowfort
Instagram
Twitter
Facebook
Patreon (you can follow us for free here too!)
(OJST founder Erika Moen also has her own monthly Patron if you’d like to support her! She’s currently working on a mental health book/pitch for next year!)
div.script: <!-- function toggle_expander(id) { var e = document.getElementById(id); if(e.style.height == 'auto') e.style.height = '1px'; else e.style.height = 'auto'; } //-->

div.div:
Page 1
Eve Breng's draws her characters with a simple, thin, clean line and then adorned with detailed decorations, like hair, flower crowns, and fabric. The environment is colored with soft teals and blues, while the characters each have a skin tone that pops against the backgrounds. There is one human woman (she/her) with light brown skin and wavy/curly shoulder-length purple hair, a water nymph (she/her) with light pink scaled skin and long straight blond hair that goes past her long pointed ears and down to her bottom, a rose-pink mermaid with thick wavy dark pink hair that tucks behind her fin-like feathered ears and past her shoulders, and a purple mer (they/them) with scaled skin, fringed ear-fins, plant-like scars over their pectorals, and long straight blue hair that reaches down to their bottom. Both mer people have beautiful fish tails with flowing scalloped fins.
In secluded woods kneels our human protagonist, fully nude and peering into a lily-pad covered pond. The air is alight with glowing specs of magic and the branches of the trees in the background grow in almost lace-like patterns. It is beautiful and serene.
"SIGH." Sighs the woman.
Breaking through the pond's surface, a nymph in a flower crown and white draping toga appears just under our human's face, asking, "Darling, you look upset! What is it?"
"Aah!" The human moans, dramatically throwing her arm over her eyes to express peak emotional torment. "I am horny and have no one to fulfill my needs! And I'm so broke I cannot afford any of those fancy toys other people have..." Gesturing to the sky with begging hands, she cries, "I'm desperate!"
Taking the human's tanned brown hand in her own light pink one, the nymph reassures her, "Oh! Fear not, for you probably have everything you need! Come!" She says, guiding her lady friend into the pond as the magic specs and dragonflies glow around them.
Page 2
Two mer people join the nymph and the human, all standing about waist-deep in the pond. The purple mer person has their hand on the handle of an ornate faucet that is surrounded by lavishly sculpted, curling fish and undersea plumage. The pink mermaid guides the hose that is attached to the faucet over to the nymph, which is topped off a the end with a shower head that sprouts an aesthetic display of water drops.
"Let me introduce you to the joy of..." The nymph tells the stunned human, who looks on at the object in wonder.
In elaborate text and surrounded with floral and oceanic accents, the title reads: The ShowerHead!
"Eep! It tickles!" The human shrieks playfully when the nymph turns the gentle water shower at her while the pink mermaid peaks mischievously behind her back.
"Now let's get to business! Let's change the setting to « massage » and..." Announces the nymph, deftly twisting a part of the shower head to turn the gentle shower in a concentrated stream.
"Oh!" The human reacts as the water jet blasts into her cupped hands. "That's more than tickling! I get why it's called massage!" She says as her eyes turn into swirls of surprised delight.
"Heehee! Now take it!" Laughs the nymph as she hands the shower head to the human's hands. "But be warned!"
Page 3
As she hands the shower head over in one hand, the nymph forlornly brings a nearby pink waterlily to her face as she warns, "Do not EVER put the stream in your vagina or any other hole! Water pressure like that can cause all kinds of damage, so play safe!"
"Yes, of course!" The human replies sincerely, her fingertips barely brushing against the hand of the nymph that is holding the shower head, which continues to pump out its solid stream of water.
The nymph leans in close to whisper into the human's ear, her lips almost brushing against her cheek, "You know what to do..."
At last the shower head is in the human's hands and she plunges it below the water's surface with a medium-sized SPLASH. While the human blushes with wide eyes, the mer people flank her on either side looking expectant and excited. Under water, she positions the shower head a few inches above her vulva so the water jet blasts straight onto her bean-sized clitoris. Her purple pubic hair curls elegantly on either side of her labia. The mer people support her underwater, holding her aloft so she can continue to breathe above the pond's surface. She drapes on leg over the purple mer person's curled tail, with her free hand pressed against the creature's shimmery-scaled back as they, in turn, use their own purple hand to gently tease the human's breast.
"Ooh! It's really nice!" She exclaims to the pink mermaid who supports her on her other side. "The feeling of hot water, the pressure...! Aah! It's as if I'm being caressed, but the sensations are truly unique! What if I move at the same time? ...aaaAAAHHHH!!!" She cries out and then immediately pulls the shower head back above water while its jet continues to flow. "But wait!! I don't have a showerhead with this kind of setting at home! Mine is just a plain old one!"
Page 4
"Well, if you've got at least a hose you can always take the standard showerhead..." The nymph narrates over a diagram of the shower head being unscrewed from its hose. "And then..." Holding the hose so the water stream blasts straight up like a little fountain, the nymph says confidently, "There you go! Easy!" While the human claps her hands in delight.
Bringing the hose down between her legs, the human leans back into the support of the purple mer and moans, "Ooh!! Wow!! This is even better!! Like a super powerful laser beam, with so much more pressure! I LOVE IIIT!!!" Little hearts emanate around her head as her cheeks flush.
Plucking a pink water lily, the nymph explains, "Yup! We've found that it's different for everybody... Some like it gentle and caressing, others like to pull away the stream a little to have a slower build-up, and other even add a dildo!"
From off screen, we hear our human erupt in pleasure and primal release.
Page 5
"How as that?" Asks the nymph, leaning in close to the recovering human's flushed face.
"Aah... Perfect!" She gasps, little hearts still emanating around her head.
"Good! Now you can go back to your home..." The nymph declares with a kiss on her lips. "And you'll know what to do whenever you need!"
"Oh yes!" Agrees the human as she climbs back onto land, looking over her shoulder at her watery friends. "Thank you!"
The nymph takes a minute to bask in the glow of success, resting her head in her hands while little hearts sparkle around her head.
"Oh woe is me!" A voice pierces through the moment, catching the attention of the three water people. A person in a long flowing sea foam green toga stands dramatically at the edge of the opposite side of the pond. Their arm is flung over their eyes in despair, just as our protagonist had done at the beginning of the story. "I'm so horny and haven't had sex in so long!"
"Another soul to save!" Exclaims the nymph as she and her shimmery, magical crew swim to the new human. The hose elegantly trails behind the group, entwining with her flowing toga and their mer tails. Above the water she holds the attachment aloft towards the human's reaching hand. "Madam, let me introduce you to... The Showerhead!"
The sky is filled with the glow of dragonflies and magic.
Transcribed by Erika Moen on December 2, 2024

div.div:
DANG, now that’s a lot of toy recommendations. We can’t thank Early to Bed enough for their help again this year in coming up with a fresh new Best-Of list. These are the toys the team feels passionate about, the new ones they’re excited for and the old ones that are staples. We’d be honored if it helps you find a toy, and even more so if you try to buy it from Early to Bed first and foremost (‘OHJOY’ should get you 10% off!)

No joke, but this comic was a couple of years in the making; it takes so much sweat to make something like this, and Erika and I aren’t spring chickens any more! It means so much to us that you found your way here and hopefully used the list to find a toy. We took the chance at the end of todays comic to plug our Patreon! It’s the heart that keeps this site going, so if you want to see us keep making comics, please pop on by and support us!
Fancy a trip down memory lane? Check out the previous Best-Of’s!
You’d be surprised to see a lot of the same toy-names pop up (that means they’re just that good!)
– 2014 – The first one!
– 2015 – We showed you the toys that lived in our bedroom! I still think the cold open and closer are super fun.
– 2016 – A really solid list, and playful comic.
– 2017 – We started to recommend all kinds of stuff! I think Erika’s art was really popping in this one too.
– 2018 – We stepped foot outside of toys and just recommend the things we love. I still grin when I think that I got to get Erika to draw my favorite climbing shoes at the time.
– 2019-20 – Gosh I still love… pretty much this whole list? It’s a REALLY good list.
– 2020-21 – The Covid years 0_0
– 2022-23 – Our FIRST Early-to-Bed collab!

You know, the things that bring me joy! Like my (growing) collection of sex toys! Treating myself to a little storage makeover for my birthday […]

div.div:
Hey gang! I don’t know about you, but whenever I’m feeling overwhelmed by all the things out of my control I turn my focus to the things I CAN control. You know, the things that bring me joy! Like my (growing) collection of sex toys! Treating myself to a little storage makeover for my birthday tickled my brain just right and left me one fewer thing to fuss over. Let’s all strive to remember what brings us joy and keep it close to our hearts.
Ripleys Links!
BlueSky
Here on OJST!
Matt’s added note!
This week I want to call out and thank our amazing long-term supporter David D Levine! He writes sci-fi steampunk fair that’s pretty gosh darned fun, while also supporting independent creative organizations such as ours. As we move into 2025 during a turbulent time (this week our new Reddit was suspended, Tumblr let us know they’d not restore our page, our Facebook remains under censorship attack, and just yesterday our Patreon has been temporarily suspended (hopefully only for a day or two), David is helping us keep the lights on. If you’re feeling generous, go take a peek at some of his work this week!
David isn’t the only one! I owe Violet Olson and Ryan Hill both huge thanks yous too for the continued support. They’re the other two faces, along with David’s, on the left side of the site and are both amazing, kind and generous. Truly this month has been a doozy, but having such supportive company on our side of the fence has kept us sane and alive.
FINALLY a lil reminder of all the places you can still find and follow us at!

↓ Comic Transcript
Ripley LaCross draws in a realistic-ish cartoony style, using a color palette of orange, orange-red, black, white, and gray. The author is a nonbinary person who uses they/them pronouns and sports glasses, shaggy orange hair, and a smattering of facial hairs.
Page 1
An assortment of panels show well-organized spots around a house. A drawer is pulled open to reveal neatly folded and horizontally stacked clothing. Containers on a desk hold sorted pens and mechanical pencils. Petite plastic drawers are labeled with their contents. In a closet hangs black t-shirts on one side and black hoodies on the other. Jars a labeled with their different rices.
Narration: Ever hear that joke, "Their idea of an exciting Saturday night is organizing their sock drawer?" That person is *me*. It brings me peace to bring order to disorder. (And these days I'll take it where I can get it.) So if this is how I live my life...
Ripley kneels at an open box on the floor, gesturing in disgust at the sexual paraphernalia erupting from it and spilling over the sides as they shout at us, "...Why the hell is my sex toy boy such a FUCKING MESS!?"
Page 2
Narration: It's not for lack of desire, it's just, y'know, out of sight, out of mind! Heck, even during playtime I hardly see it.
In the dark, Ripley dangles over the edge of their bed, squinting as they try to discern one dildo from the other as they pull them from their sex toy boy.
"...You need a hand down there?" Asks a voice from the other side of the bed.
"No! I mean, maybe." Replies Ripley in frustrated concentration. "I can't find Little Blue... THEY'RE ALL BLACK IN THIS LIGHT."
Narration: I think it's time to treat myself to a makeover.
Now well-illuminated in the light of day, Ripley sits in bed thumbing through their phone.
Narration: For inspiration I of course took to the Internet, and there's some real above and beyond stuff out there. But let's be real, most of the stuff that makes it online is flashy, expensive, or just plain silly.
Cocking their head, Ripley asks their phone, "Are those dildos hanging from a wine glass rack...?"
Page 3
Striking a jaunty pose as they gesture with their hand, Ripley informs us, "I'm a simple, cheap dude. I don't need a velvet-lined, leather-bound, standing trunk with bells, whistles, and a lube warmer. I only want something that meets my needs."
As an aside, a chibi version of Ripley ponders a bottle labeled LUBE next to a steaming mug labeled NOT LUBE which sits upon a corded heating coaster. "(Though a lube warmer would be cool, could use it for coffee...)" They observe.
Title: SOME IDEAS: A Tool Box
Next to an illustration of a classic toolbox with fold-out compartments is a list of details, reading:
+Easy to clean
+Inconspicuous
+Can cover in stickers!
+Travel-ready
-Not very big
A mini-Ripley leans against the toolbox, holding a hammer by its head so the handle points proudly into the air like a phallus. They say, "Incredibly on-brand for me."
Title: That Vintage Trunk I saw at the Antique Store Last Week
An old-fashioned steamer trunk with a removable compartment is accompanied with the list:
+Super cool
+Removable tray
+Large capacity
-Smells funny
-Has it ever been cleaned?
Now in pirate-garb with a hook for a hand, Mini Ripley adds "Yarr, like a treasure chest!"
Title: Well-Known Swedish Store Under-Bed Drawers
Two rectangular drawers with little rollers under their corners sit side-by-side, accompanied by the list:
+Blends in
+XL Capacity
-Expensive
-Blocks power outlets
An extremely simplified, stylistic humanoid illustration appears, the only way we can tell it's Ripley is because it has several orange hairs on its head and wears glasses. "Most of my room is IKEA anyway, may as well!" They chirp.
Page 4
Lil' Ripley stands with a very fancy large container, holding part of its top open with one hand. It is large, flat-ish, rectangle with wheels at each corner and many, many removable, modular mini-containers within it.
"Ultimately, I chose a system that's a little basic, but perfect for me!" Says Ripley with a thumbs-up.
Title: Generic Under-Bed Storage Bin
List accompanying storage bin:
+XL Capacity
+Lid stays attached
+Removable, dishwasher-safe trays
+Easy to clean
+Color-coordinated satin bags
+Landing tray for dirty toys
Caption: HOT TIP: Shoe bags, tarot bags, and wig bags are the same as bags sold for sex toys, but without the upcharge!
Stretching out next to the open container which now holds sexual accoutrements in a nice, orderly fashion, Ripley explains as they point out various compartments, "It's so beautiful, I may just have a brain-gasm. Look, all the random charging cables go here... Lube n' stuff lives right here... Booty business goes over here... Each toy gets a new bag and a dedicated home. Struggling to find something in the dark will be a thing of the past!"
Page 5
Fully in the buff, Ripley sits on their bed with several sex-toy-filled containers around them, plus the container with two bottles of lube that they hold in their hands as they tell us confidently, "Since I'll know where everything is, playtime will be easy-breezy. Just grab my trays of choice and go to town!" The "landing tray" sits empty next to them.
Now in the bathroom, Ripley is in the process of sliding used toys off of the tray and into the sink with running water as they continue, "Dirty toys get quarnatined on their own tray and it all gets washed at the same time. I'm all about efficiency."
"And then!" Ripley announces, standing over the completely closed-up storage box which looks incredibly discreet. "The best part! When evertying's clean and ry... it all goes back where it belongs! Inner peace frickin' ACQUIRED!" Stars and accentuations marks shine around this marvelous box.
Ripley's phone fills up with the selfie they've just taken of them and the organized contents of their storage box while they wink and give the peace sign. Emoji stickers of stars and a tongue-sticky-outty-face adorn the image, along with the caption, "Just another WILD Saturday night!!"

div.div:
Bear Hien and Hyena Ziggy share with us an honest conversation about toys, relationships and intimacy. It’s a little piece from in between the panels and comics we usually make here, a peek behind the curtain as these two share and hash out what toys mean and bring to their lives.
Today’s script was a collaborative one between our regular artist Hien and our behind-the-scenes editor Ziggy! I think I think it really turned out lovely. Seeing real human (sorry; furry) conversations like this is maybe one of my most favorite kind of comics. It’s a level of shared personhood that feels like the pinnacle of what comics can do. A huge word of thanks to both Artist Extraordinaire Hien Pham and our editor powerhouse Ziggy!
Hien’s Blog Notes:
Thank you to my editor Ziggy for sharing his stories and working on this comic with me! Thank you to Matthew as well for your editorial feedback as always! This is my 40th comic with OJST and I haven’t stopped feeling so honoured working with every single person on the team. Oh, and another special shout-out to Woody for giving me the special moment that blossomed into this comic <3. Last but not least, thank you to Uberrime for the fantastic fantasy dildos that I can’t wait to review!
Portfolio
Interactive stuff
Patreon
Twitter
Sexy Comics
Here on OJST!
Some NEWS about Facebook!
I usually harp on at the end here and promote the Patreon, but this week I wanted to address the not-so-quiet elephant in the room that is Facebook. A great deal of you have been reaching out to let us know that in the past week, OJST posts (even a decade old) are being removed from Facebook pages. We’re not sure why, other than it seems wide reaching and timed alongside a great swath of other anti-right, pro-left advocacy groups getting the same treatment. This isn’t our first rodeo being blackmarked or attacked for our values- heck a month ago Tumblr deleted our account without warning or reply.
While we’re not quite sure what to do currently (other than keep posting our comics/censored feature images), here is a reminder that we can be found elsewhere online, especially if we suddenly disappear from your feeds!
Bluesky
Mastodon
Pillowfort
Instagram
Twitter
Facebook
Patreon (you can follow us for free here too!)
Finally I plan to keep this site up as long as I can! You can always find us here at Oh Joy Sex Toy
We’ve really been enjoying our time on Bluesky if you’d like a recommendation! This next year we hope to show up more in Reddit too! So more to come on that front soon =)

↓ Comic Transcript
Hien Pham draws in a cartoon-y realistic style with the full spectrum of colors. Today's comic, and specifically the script was a collaborative effort between Hien and Ziggy.
Character Descriptions:
Hien: Brown bear with a beard and a hair bun.
Ziggy: Spotted hyena with round glasses, nose ring, and ear gauges.
Hien's friend: Ginger bear with a full fluffy beard.
Ex 1: Sleek doberman in a bathrobe. cis guy, he/him.
Ex 2: Leather-clad lion with his mane tied back. cis guy, he/him.
Ex 3: Kinky cat, trans woman, she/her
Page 1
Through a pinky-purple-y tinted video chat window, Hien proudly holds up a bouquet of fantastical creature dildos that look more like art pieces than sex toys. "Ziggy!" He exclaims. "Check these out! I just got these in for a review!"
In a green tinted video chat window, Ziggy replies, "Whoah, those are gorgeous! Are they all for the site?"
"Yeah!" Hien replies, twirling his treasures around like glow sticks at a rave. "I've got a couple of bottom bears excited to help me test 'em out, hehe!" He sticks his tongue out in silly anticipation of the upcoming good times.
"Lucy you!" Says Ziggy. "Got a queue of willing test subjects outside the door, huh?"
"Naw! Just a couple of close friends!" Hien responds. "Surely you have an entourage of your own toy enthusiasts over there?"
Demurely, Ziggy answers, "You'd be surprised! I haven't always had the easiest time bringing toys into the bedroom."
Hien is boggled. "Really?!"
"Yeah, a couple of my exes were kinda OFFENDED by them." Ziggy says with a shrug.
Page 2
In a sepia-toned flashback we see Ziggy and his doberman in a bedroom.
Lounging on the bed, the doberman seductively asks, "Wanna try something new tonight?"
"I thought you'd never ask!" Exclaims Ziggy, already diving to pull open the sex toy drawer in his nightstand. A giant vibrator, butt plug, and a wearable small vibrator come flying out.
Bursting into tears, the doberman sobs, "W-whyyy do you hate my penis?!? I just wanted to top for once!!!"
Horrified in the background, Ziggy stammers, "That's not what I meant..."
In a different flashback, Ziggy is out window shopping at the sex store with his lion companion.
"Ooh!" Ziggy gasps in delight, pressing his snoot and hands up against the window where a glorious, giant butt plug with a luxurious flowing ponytail is upright on display.
"Absolutely not." The lion says cooly. "That's way too gay."
"TOO GAY?!" Ziggy responds in complete surprise. "But you love it when I-"
"HAHAHA I don't know what you're talking about!!!" The lion cuts him off with great nervous anxiety, looking over his shoulder and clamping his hand over Ziggy's mouth before he can finish.
Back in the present day with full color, Hien responds, "That's a big YIKES from me!"
"Yeah, those relationships did NOT last!" Ziggy responds with a shrug. "Sounds like your dildos came about from a happy story though, eh?"
"Welll..." Begins Hien.
Page 3
The scene turns sepia once again as we dive into Hien's flashback with his bear friend. The two of them are chatting excitedly as Hien shares what's on his phone.
Narration: I wanted to top an intimate friend of mine, but not with my penis. So we went online to pick out a dildo to play with..."
"I really like the more fantastical ones!" Hien tells the bearded ginger bear with a coy, eager look.
"Me too!" His friend agrees. "We're not looking for your replacement, but something entirely new to experience together."
Narration: That moment really stuck with me. I was so moved.
The full color of the present day returns to the scene with Hien reminiscing dreamily, "It felt so affirming, like he understood me in a deeply personal way."
"Awww!" Coos Ziggy. "You wouldn't expect it, but toys def have the power to enable connections between people!"
Page 4
In Ziggy's sepia-colored flashback, his narration reads, "Like, I remember I had a partner who was really into sensory play. She loved soft, smooth sensations, but I'm super ticklish, so they didn't work for me..." Feathers, a flogger, a paddle, a pokey tool, and a multi-wheeled rolling tool are laid out on a surface, all tinted brownish. A single pinwheel tool stands out against the rest in shining white. "...until we tried a pinwheel! Game changer!"
Ziggy squeezes his eyes shut in pleasure and light pain as a hand drives the pinwheel up his back, leaving behind a trail of little pokes.
Narration: Even though we each liked a different type of sensation, being able to share that sensory experience really brought us together.
Ziggy's hand runs a feather boa across his kitty-friend's back, who is lost in happiness.
The flashback ends, bringing us back to present day Hien and Ziggy in full color.
"The toys brought you an understanding of your then-partner in a way you wouldn't have had access to otherwise!" Observes Hien.
"When you keep an open mind, toys can do so much beyond just sexual pleasure." Closing his eyes in thought, Ziggy concludes, "I wish my exes could have seen the potential that I saw in sex toys."
Page 5
From out of nowhere, Hien hauls out a bundle of rope which he spins in a lasso over his head like a cowboy.
"The best toys I have complement the skills I already possess, and give me brand-new techniques I'm excited to practice and master!" Explains Hien with pride, twirling his lasso expertly.
"They bridge the space between us and open up new sensory experiences for me and the people I am intimate with." Agree Ziggy as the vibrator his is holding is lassoed by Hien's rope.
Across a montage of sex toys, both Hien and Ziggy's intermingling texts read, "When I look at my arsenal, I don't feel shame. I feel warmth. I feel excitement. I feel pride."
"Oh joy!" Exclaims Hien, yoinking Ziggy and his lassoed vibrator across the divide of their chat windows and into a shared reality where they lean against each other.
"Indeed!" Ziggy concludes with a wink.
Transcribed by Erika Moen, November 11, 2024

Too tight, Too firm, too hot, too cold. Hien is on a quest to find the perfect sleeve for the Goldicock! Today he reviews the Tenga Geo, 3D, and Spinner.
The process to find the right sex toy for you and your body can be can be so gosh darned disheartening, but ever so worth it when you eventually find the one that just clicks. I love that he’s also fallen for some of Tenga’s toys in the same way as I did ;D Thank you so much, Hien, for your continued excitement, honesty, and talent!

A white middle-aged man with salt and pepper hair, Goldicock has neat facial hair, his penis is smaller than average with tight foreskin (phimosis) and wears no clothing at all.

Ready for his turn, the chibi-fied Model D steps up confidently to suggest, "Why don't you give my pick a shot!" He is a blond brown-skinned man with a dark goatee.

div.p: Happy Halloween everybody!

Have you struggled to hook up with a sexy monster in the past? Breaching the spectral plane feeling insurmountable this year? Look no further than Simon Shadow’s (and Xb’rax’s) amazingly helpful guide to fucking a monster. Perfect for humans and monster’s alike. A comic you can really sink your teeth into/wrap your tentacle around/host you can implant.

This was such a delight to work on (and I’m excited to say we have another one with Simon in the works too!), if you found it useful, or heck have a success story after following todays useful guide, make sure to let Simon!

🎉**Our Patreon!**🎉
$5 burning a hole in your pocket? Come and support OJST and it’s efforts to make free, weekly, sex positive comics. For the price of a coffee you can help keep this company going: more now than ever! In exchange, get access to a bunch of behind the scenes stuffs, our little community, and a bunch more. We keep hiring folks to make these comics, because we know how impactful it can be when some one in need comes across the right comic. No joke; our archives are fast approaching 600 comic, all of them are freeeee; keep us going, and we’ll keepmaking these as long as we can!
(OJST founder Erika Moen also has her own monthly Patron if you’d like to support her! She’s currently working on a mental health book/pitch for next year!)

div.data-a2a-title: How To Fuck Your Monster by Simon Shadows

div.script: <!-- function toggle_expander(id) { var e = document.getElementById(id); if(e.style.height == 'auto') e.style.height = '1px'; else e.style.height = 'auto'; } //-->

div.div:
PAGE 1
The color palette is purple, pale lime green, white, and black. Simon Shadows draws with a cartoon-y style that is accentuated with lots of fine details.
Xb'rax is a humanoid creature with a white exoskeleton and an alien/insectoid kind of head. They have formations on their faceplate that rise up in a kind of fan/crown formation over their forehead, and two enormous pupil-less purple eyes on either side of their face. They have the basis of skeletal wing supports jutting out on either side, but there is no actual wing membrane attached. They are nightmarishly handsome.
"Hello, humans!" Xb'rax greets us cheerfully against a background of writhing eyes, tentacles, and fang-y mouths. "Do you like sex? I'm Xb/rax with the Abyssal Plane Tourism Board, and I'm here to ask why not try..."
Tile written in oozing pink cursive letters: Sex With Monsters?
"Ah," They continue. "so I've piqued your interest. Let's get into it! You can find creatures all around you!"
Caption: 1. Finding Monsters
Xb'rax's disembodied voice floats over a dark forest with black trees that look at us with their discreet eyeballs and coiling lime green fox in the background, announcing, "Spooky woods!"
A lime green coiling mass of energy snakes explode through a brick alleyway as Xb'rax narrates, "Extraplanar rifts!"
A purple hand with a silver thumb ring holds up their iPhone, which displays a program named "monstr" and shows a grid of creature-y profile pictures. "Dating apps!" Explains Xb'rax's voice.
Our narrator joins a line-up of wildly different monsters and creatures that stretches the width of the page as they continue, "Just remember... not all monsters like huymans or want to be an 'experiment.' Get comfy hearing the word 'no'!" Some creatures are humanoid, others are beastial, and some defy description.
PAGE 2
Xb'rax's voice narrates, "You may not be able to tell a monster's age. Don't be afraid to ask for ID! 18+ only!"
A human stands with her hand out expectantly, asking a floating flaming skull, "ID?" Looking at the card, she reads "DOB: 14 billion years ago" and gives the skull a thumbs up. The skull's eye sockets squinch up, implying that they are smiling even though they have no lower jaw.
"Summoning a possible date?" Asks Xb'rax as they lean over a human-looking person who diligently writing away on the many scattered papers surrounding them, illuminated by a single candle. "Think about consent while writing spells. You can always cast another after you negotiate!"
A close-up reveals one line on a parchment that reads, "I'll be ur human fucktoy forever~ uwu"
"When in doubt, consult a pro summoner!" Xb'rax suggests, while gesturing to a hooded figure who waves at us. A hint of magic sparkles by their obscured face and their ceremonial glowing necklace is quite eye-catching. The summoner is labeled "4.8 on Yelp!"
Caption: 2. Communication and Negotiation
We are taken to a scene of stalagmite undersea coral-like formations that are topped with long swaying fronds and covered in spying eyes. In the foreground is a human looking bewitched and delighted, drooling just a little as they grin from ear to ear and their cheeks flush. A giant brain-like creature rests atop their head with their tentacles holding on to the sides of the human's head.
"Not all beings can speak or sign a human language." The voice of Xb'rax tells us. "Consent requires some form of communication..."
"I really like spanking." A voice says, which is emanating from both the brain-creature and human.
Xb'rax continues, "...so you may need to get creative!"
PAGE 3
"Talk about the things you like!" Encourages the narrator.
"I'd like to be totally restrained and unable to move." Shares a human who looks us squarely in the eyes and holds a bundle of Shibari rope in her left
hand. They wear a sports bra, have an assortment of tattoos, one of which covers the stump at the end of her right arm, and a small cloud of tightly curly black hair.
"I'd like to be totally restrained and unable to move." She announces.
"I've always wanted to roleplay as a human housewife." a moss-cocovered kind of dragon-worm with a ring of eyes running along the width of its head tells us.
"Go over all the boundaries and nos!" Xb'rax's voice urges next to the head of a kind of crustacean-alien-bug person that has many craggy segmented plates lining its face and an assortment of claw/horns.
"If sunlight touches this mortal form, I'll demanifest," Explains the creature to us. "so let's keep the shades drawn."
A topless human smiles at us as they hold a vibrating double-pronged sex toy and tells us, "Vaginal penetration is ok, but no anal." This person has shoulder-length choppy dark hair, a tattoo of a snake coiling around their right arm, and surgical scars under their flat pectoral muscles on their chest. Their vibrator goes, "bzzzz".
"Whew!" The narrator's voice exclaims. "You're ready to go! Let's get to the juicy stuff."
Caption: 3. Safety During Play
A human clad only in boxers sits on a bed with their knees drawn up to their chest, smiling at the winged devil-humanoid who sits facing them.
"When I moult into my full form, stroke my wings to calm me down." The batwing-ed creature tells the human amiably.
"Use your words or other means of communication!" Urges the narrators voice as the human is now shown laying beneath the transformed incarnation of the previous creature, who is now a larger-than-life scaled dragon beast with a bat-like monster face, complete with multiple eyes and a gaping maw of fangs.
"A little too rough!" Pants the human as they massage the creature's wing membrane between thumb and forefinger. The expression of the person is scrunched up in both pleasure and pain, it is the face of endurance and someone recognizing their limits.
"No worries, bro." Responds the fearsome hell monster, droplets of their green sweat contrasting against the purple of the person's skin tone.
PAGE 4
Rejoining us, Xb'rax announces, "Don't be afraid to change your mind even if you said 'yes' before!" while gesturing to the tentacle-y scene behind them. A human is suspended in the air by a mass of writing root-like appendages that presumably belong to the enormous multi-eyed creature face that learns at them from the foreground.
"I thought I'd like having all my holes stuffed..." The human informs the great beast. "...but please leave my ears alone."
In another scene, a different human asks, "Your roared when I rubbed your horns. Did you like that?" of the horny (literally, they have many horns) fork-tongued anthropomorphic creature gleefully lapping away at the person's cock.
"Ask questions, and be enthusiastic!" The narrator's voice encourages over the preceding scene and the next one.
A tubular, seaweed-y creature uses one of its various tube-y appendages to plumb the depths of a delighted and sweaty human's butt hole with a sound of "SHLUK SHLUK". "I love the way your ichor feels tingly on my balls." Shares the human between pants. "More of that, please!" The person's long curly hair mostly falls behind their shoulders, with two curling tendrils resting just above their full breasts while their hard cock flops against their belly, covered in fluids.
"Be creative and have fun!" Shares the narrator's voice over two more scenes of human/non-human sexual interaction.
In the first scene, a monstrously mutated wasp-like creature positions their ovipositor between the spread legs of a human who is bound up Shibari-style in a kind of web. The insects abdomen glows with hundreds of round green eggs that pulse against their casing, like a lumpy sac of potatoes.
"I'm gravid," Explains the creature to the delighted human. "but the eggs are infertile. If I lay them in you, your body will just absorb them."
"Do it!!" Gleefully urges the human, barely giving the hellish monstrosity time to finish their question.
"I'm so close..." Another human pants as they furiously fuck away at the surfboard-sized glowing crystal formation beneath them. "Can you loop time again when I come?"
"You got it." Responds the beautiful rock, though they have no mouth from which to speak.
"That was fun. Now it's time to clean up." Concludes Xb'rax's narration.
PAGE 5
Caption: Aftercare
"Discuss aftercare needs before play, and leave time for them afterwards." The narration reads over two different scenes.
"I like to cuddle and be called 'good boy' after a rough topping." A topless human in a chest harness tells us.
A cone of lightning bolt surges informs us, "I will dematerialize after I come, so please use this amulet to resurrect me, and then I'd like some juice."
"Sometimes play can bring up big feelings! Leave room for them, too." Recounts Xb'rax's voice over the scene of an enormous bed, post-fucking. The blankets are rumbled, pillows are strewn about, and there's a variety of sexual aids sprinkled among the folds of fabric, in addition to one book with a pentagram and titled, "Sex Spells". A human lays on their side, entangled with the enormous demon that lays facing them, making the person appear to be quite small simply by comparison. The monster has enormous curling rams horns on their head, long features sprouting across their body and even more enormous, nightmarish feathered demon wings that rest against the terrain of their rumpled bed.
"Everyone always thinks of me as an EVIL demon king." The Demon King confesses to the human cuddled up in their burly, feathered arm. "It's nice to just pretend for once."
"There, there..." The human reassures their vulnerable partner with a look of peaceful contentment.
The narration concludes with, "Make sure everyone is good to go home." over the scene of a row of humans and creatures tucked in under the blankets next to each other as a wall of enormous eyeballs watches over them.
"I can still hear everyone's thoughts a little bit after that mind-meld." Announces one person sleepily with a tentacle coiling around a lock of their hair. "I need some more time before I'm good to drive."
Xb'rax rejoins us to finish with, "So that's that! You've got all the info you need to start exploring. Now, I gotta run! I've got a hot date at the spawning pool, but maybe I'll catch you there next time!"
